bug.title: JDK Http client do not handler CONTENT_ENCODING
bug.body: **Describe the bug** In `ResponseHandler` like `StringResponseHandler`, If the server return `gzip` CONTENT_ENCODING, it will not try to decompress content but read content directly. It may caused the content is not right or garbled text. I think other `ResponseHandler` has the same problem. **Expected behavior** Handler `gzip` content correctly. **Acutally behavior** return garbled text. **How to Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. publish a config in ACM 2. use 1.3.1 or 1.3.2 version SDK get the config 3. print the config got from ACM 4. See garbled text **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: Any OS - Version: nacos-client 1.3.1, 1.3.2 - Module: config - SDK: original **Additional context** I think adding an encoding handler to do decompress will be better, which can not only support gzip.

bug.title: client error: invalid param. For input string: "${nacos.config.maxRetry${nacos.maxRetry:}}"
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> **Describe the bug** 在1.3.1和1.3.2的版本中，若没有明确指定 nacos.config.max-retry 的值，启动springboot程序，将会报如标题所示错误。 **Expected behavior** 预期程序正常启动，该值采用默认值3 **Acutally behavior** 实际上会报如标题所示错误。 **How to Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 调试发现，在1.3.0版本中，采用的是org.apache.commons.lang3.math.NumberUtils.toInt(String str, int defaultValue)方法。 而报错的版本采用的是com.alibaba.nacos.common.utils.ConvertUtils.toInt(String val, int defaultValue)方法。 理论上报错版本的方法也没问题，但是不知道为什么在默认情况下传进来的val的值是${nacos.config.maxRetry${nacos.maxRetry:}}，导致程序出错。 **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: [e.g. Centos] - Version [e.g. nacos-server 1.3.2, nacos-client 1.3.2] - Module [e.g. naming/config] - SDK [e.g. original, spring-cloud-alibaba-nacos, dubbo] **Additional context** Add any other context about the problem here.

bug.title: 【BUG】naming raft remove the wrong file
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> **Describe the bug** All persistent service information could not be saved to a file because the wrong file was removed **Expected behavior** Files in old formats should be removed **Acutally behavior** ```java // remove old format file: if (StringUtils.isNoneBlank(namespaceId)) { if (datum.key.contains(Constants.DEFAULT_GROUP + Constants.SERVICE_INFO_SPLITER)) { String oldDatumKey = datum.key .replace(Constants.DEFAULT_GROUP + Constants.SERVICE_INFO_SPLITER, StringUtils.EMPTY); cacheFile = cacheFile(cacheFileName(namespaceId, datum.key)); if (cacheFile.exists() && !cacheFile.delete()) { Loggers.RAFT.error("[RAFT-DELETE] failed to delete old format datum: {}, value: {}", datum.key, datum.value); throw new IllegalStateException("failed to delete old format datum: " + datum.key); } } } ``` **How to Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Go to '...' 2. Click on '....' 3. Scroll down to '....' 4. See error **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: [Mac os] - Version [nacos-server 1.3.1+] - Module [naming] **Additional context** Add any other context about the problem here.

bug.title: Logging in with the wrong username or password will cause jackson serialization results to fail
bug.body: **Describe the bug** Logging in with the wrong username or password will cause jackson serialization results to fail, because the response header contains null key,and after catching this exception, the username and password will be printed,i think that is dangerous. **Expected behavior** Do not print the password after the login fails, just print the message in the error log **Acutally behavior** Log in with the wrong username or password, jackson serialization login response failed **How to Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Login with wrong username or password 2. You will see the following error log in the console 2020-08-26 15:52:40.709 ERROR 9140 --- [.naming.updater] c.a.nacos.client.security.SecurityProxy : [SecurityProxy] login http request failed url: http://192.168.10.64:8848/nacos/v1/auth/users/login, params: {username=nacos}, bodyMap: {password=abc}, errorMsg: errCode: 100, errMsg: Nacos serialize for class [com.alibaba.nacos.common.http.HttpRestResult] failed. **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: windows - Version nacos-server 1.3.2 - Module client

bug.title: The nacos client did not encode in the post request
bug.body: Client such as: spring-cloud-starter-alibaba-nacos-discovery The configured password is not encoded in the post, so the special symbol "+" is not supported.

bug.title: ControllerMethodsCache.getMethod() will mismatch sometimes
bug.body: **Describe the bug** ControllerMethodsCache.getMethod() will mismatch when the request's path is same,but the param is not same. such as: @GetMapping com.alibaba.nacos.config.server.controller.ConfigController#searchConfig @GetMapping(params = "search=accurate") com.alibaba.nacos.config.server.controller.ConfigController#getConfig @GetMapping(params = "search=blur") com.alibaba.nacos.config.server.controller.ConfigController#fuzzySearchConfig ControllerMethodsCache.getMethod() can't match correctly in (com.alibaba.nacos.core.auth.AuthFilter, com.alibaba.nacos.naming.web.DistroFilter)

bad SQL grammar [select 1 from config_info_beta limit 1]; nested exception is java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Syntax error: Encountered "1" at line 1, column 38. 2020-07-18 08:37:50,884 ERROR An exception occurred during the query operation : com.alibaba.nacos.config.server.exception.NJdbcException: BadSqlGrammarException:Syntax error: Encountered "1" at line 1, column 38. 2020-07-18 08:37:50,910 ERROR [db-error] DataAccessException : caused: StatementCallback; bad SQL grammar [select 1 from config_info_tag limit 1]; nested exception is java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Syntax error: Encountered "1" at line 1, column 37.;caused: Syntax error: Encountered "1" at line 1, column 37.;caused: Syntax error: Encountered "1" at line 1, column 37.; bug.title: 管理后台token失效不自动跳转登录页
bug.body: ## 管理端token失效不自动跳转登录页 Type: *bug report* 版本：1.3.1 经查代码发现是前端统一处理 403 forbidden 的时候一个bug： 后端代码处理login时抛异常，message是"token invalid!"，前端处理403的时候判断的是"token invalid"。 综上：前端判断403的时候少了个"!"。 后端代码：com.alibaba.nacos.console.security.nacos.NacosAuthManager#login 第74行 ``` try { tokenManager.validateToken(token); } catch (ExpiredJwtException e) { throw new AccessException("token expired!"); } catch (Exception e) { throw new AccessException("token invalid!"); } ``` 前端代码：nacos\console\src\main\resources\static\console-fe\src\globalLib.js 第531行 ``` error => { // 处理403 forbidden const { status, responseJSON = {} } = error || {}; if (responseJSON.message) { Message.error(responseJSON.message); } if ( [401, 403].includes(status) && ['unknown user!', 'token invalid', 'token expired!'].includes(responseJSON.message) ) { goLogin(); } return error; } ``` nacos\console\src\main\resources\static\console-fe\src\utils\request.js 第88行 ``` error => { if (error.response) { const { data = {}, status } = error.response; let message = `HTTP ERROR: ${status}`; if (typeof data === 'string') { message = data; } else if (typeof data === 'object') { message = data.message; } Message.error(message); if ( [401, 403].includes(status) && ['unknown user!', 'token invalid', 'token expired!'].includes(message) ) { goLogin(); } return Promise.reject(error.response); } Message.error(API_GENERAL_ERROR_MESSAGE); return Promise.reject(error); } ```

bug.title: [bug report] startup.sh complains about [[: not found
bug.body: ## Issue Description startup.sh complains about [[: not found. ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) I'm trying to start Nacos in standalone mode by executing: ./startup.sh -m standalone It output the following: ``` ./startup.sh: 88: ./startup.sh: [[: not found ./startup.sh: 92: ./startup.sh: [[: not found ./startup.sh: 101: ./startup.sh: [[: not found ./startup.sh: 103: ./startup.sh: [[: not found ./startup.sh: 110: ./startup.sh: [[: not found /usr/lib/jvm/java-8-oracle/bin/java -server -Xms2g -Xmx2g -Xmn1g -XX:MetaspaceSize=128m -XX:MaxMetaspaceSize=320m -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError -XX:HeapDumpPath=/home/icvss-project/nacos/logs/java_heapdump.hprof -XX:-UseLargePages -Dnacos.member.list= -Djava.ext.dirs=/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-oracle/jre/lib/ext:/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-oracle/lib/ext -Xloggc:/home/icvss-project/nacos/logs/nacos_gc.log -verbose:gc -XX:+PrintGCDetails -XX:+PrintGCDateStamps -XX:+PrintGCTimeStamps -XX:+UseGCLogFileRotation -XX:NumberOfGCLogFiles=10 -XX:GCLogFileSize=100M -Dloader.path=/home/icvss-project/nacos/plugins/health,/home/icvss-project/nacos/plugins/cmdb -Dnacos.home=/home/icvss-project/nacos -jar /home/icvss-project/nacos/target/nacos-server.jar --spring.config.location=classpath:/,classpath:/config/,file:./,file:./config/,file:/home/icvss-project/nacos/conf/ --logging.config=/home/icvss-project/nacos/conf/nacos-logback.xml --server.max-http-header-size=524288 ./startup.sh: 131: ./startup.sh: [[: not found ``` ### Describe what you expected to happen I expect Nacos is running in standalone mode and no more warning about `[[: not found`. ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. Just download the lastest binary release of Nacos 2. running it under Ubuntu 14.04.2 TLS ### Tell us your environment Distributor ID: Ubuntu Description: Ubuntu 14.04.2 LTS Release: 14.04 Codename: trusty nacos-server-1.3.1 ### Anything else we need to know? N/A

bug.title: Deleted a role for an user, but this user staill has the permission about the deleted role.
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* or *feature request* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) When deleted a role(role1) for an user, the user should loss the associated permission of role1, but in fact, the user still has the permission of role1. ### Describe what you expected to happen ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. Create an user (user1) 2. Check the persmission for user1 2. Create a role(role1) which links the user user1 3. Delete the role1 4. Check the permission for user1 again ### Tell us your environment Nacos1.3.1 nacos.core.auth.enabled=true nacos.core.auth.caching.enabled=true ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: 1.3.1 注销服务异常
bug.body: 异常如下，HttpClientBeanHolder类中Logger LOGGER = LoggerFactory.getLogger(HttpClientManager.class);写错了，应该是Logger LOGGER = LoggerFactory.getLogger(HttpClientBeanHolder.class);使用addShutdownHook关闭NacosRestTemplate，发生在请求 /nacos/v1/ns/instance 之前，然后...... ``` 2020-07-14 17:17:09.221 WARN 17487 --- [ Thread-22] c.a.nacos.common.http.HttpClientManager : [HttpClientBeanFactory] Start destroying NacosRestTemplate 2020-07-14 17:17:09.227 WARN 17487 --- [ Thread-22] c.a.nacos.common.http.HttpClientManager : [HttpClientBeanFactory] Destruction of the end 2020-07-14 17:17:09.228 INFO 17487 --- [ Thread-14] o.s.s.c.ThreadPoolTaskScheduler : Shutting down ExecutorService 'Nacso-Watch-Task-Scheduler' 2020-07-14 17:17:09.254 INFO 17487 --- [ Thread-14] c.a.c.n.registry.NacosServiceRegistry : De-registering from Nacos Server now... 2020-07-14 17:17:09.265 ERROR 17487 --- [ Thread-14] c.a.c.n.registry.NacosServiceRegistry : ERR_NACOS_DEREGISTER, de-register failed... com.alibaba.nacos.api.exception.NacosException: failed to req API:/nacos/v1/ns/instance after all servers tried: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Connection pool shut down ```

bug.title: org.apache.httpcomponents 坐标版本太高引发大量异常
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description 项目maven引用 ``` <dependency> <groupId>com.alibaba.nacos</groupId> <artifactId>nacos-client</artifactId> <version>1.3.1</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.alibaba.nacos</groupId> <artifactId>nacos-api</artifactId> <version>1.3.1</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.alibaba.nacos</groupId> <artifactId>nacos-common</artifactId> <version>1.3.1</version> </dependency> ``` 官方在nacos-common默认使用 ``` <dependency> <groupId>org.apache.httpcomponents</groupId> <artifactId>httpasyncclient</artifactId> <version>4.1.3</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.apache.httpcomponents</groupId> <artifactId>httpcore</artifactId> <version>4.4.6</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.apache.httpcomponents</groupId> <artifactId>httpcore-nio</artifactId> <version>4.4.6</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.apache.httpcomponents</groupId> <artifactId>httpclient</artifactId> <version>4.5.3</version> </dependency> ``` 如果将上述httpasyncclient , httpcore,httpcore-nio,httpclient等版本升级为高版本/最新版会导致大量http request异常 目前我因使用最新版的spring boot&cloud,还有其它最新的框架如：sentinel，seata 使其上述相关maven dependency版本升级为目前的 **httpasyncclient:4.1.4, bug.title: 1.3.1-BETA SDK LifeCycle can't shutdown some thread executors.
bug.body: ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) In 1.3.1-BETA SDK, NamingServer add shutdown method to close and release resource of nacos sdk. But for my test, It can't close executors completely. `com.alibaba.nacos.naming.push.receiver` `com.alibaba.nacos.naming.client.listener` This two threads almost keep alive `com.alibaba.nacos.naming.failover` the thread keep alive sometime. ### Describe what you expected to happen After I call shutdown method, the thread and udp created by nacos should closed. ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) example code ``` public static void testShutDown() throws NacosException, InterruptedException { Properties properties = new Properties(); properties.setProperty("serverAddr", "localhost:8848"); for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) { NamingService naming = NamingFactory.createNamingService(properties); naming.registerInstance("nacos.test.3", "11.11.11.11", 8888, "TEST1"); System.out.println(naming.getAllInstances("nacos.test.3")); naming.shutDown(); TimeUnit.SECONDS.sleep(1); } while (true) { // for dump thread TimeUnit.SECONDS.sleep(10); } } ``` ### Tell us your environment Any version of nacos Server. 1.3.1-BETA nacos java SDK

bug.title: windows 下使用.\startup.cmd -m cluster -p embedded命令启动集群，启动后发现还是standalone mode
bug.body: windows 下使用.\startup.cmd -m cluster -p embedded命令启动集群，启动后发现还是standalone mode

bug.title: probably the end value is negative number in ServiceController.java
bug.body: ## Issue Description for `com.alibaba.nacos.naming.controllers.ServiceController` , probably：`end` value is negative number when start is negative Related code is : ``` int start = (pageNo - 1) * pageSize; int end = start + pageSize; if (start < 0) { start = 0; } ```

bug.title: When the RaftStore#readDatum method loads the cache file, the file currently has the suffix .datum, which causes the original SwitchKey judgment to be invalid.
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* or *feature request* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) The pr #2849 changed the name of the cache file in the `nacos/data/naming/data `directory, which will cause the `KeyBuilder#matchSwitchKey` to be invalidated in the `RaftStore#readDatum `method, and there will also be compatibility issues. The files cached in the previous version will not be Read ### Describe what you expected to happen ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. 2. 3. ### Tell us your environment ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: nacosV1.3.0集群问题
bug.body: nacos部署一主两从集群模式，当从节点出现宕机后，主从之间频繁发送心跳请求。通过curl调用beat的api无法获取到正常节点的返回值，此时注册的应用在服务器中kill掉，在nacos的监控器中不能正常下线。依然显示应用健康状态为正常，此时客户端负载调用注册的服务接口会出现调用不成功的问题

bug.title: can't save properties config
bug.body: version **1.3.0 release** if properties like this: ``` # port server.port=8762 ``` it will not work chrome console error "Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'currentLanguageCode' of undefined" chinese: properties 文件，有 "#" 注释的时候，就保存不了，控制台报错。"Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'currentLanguageCode' of undefined" 写个配置文件的时候有注释很正常呀，以前是可以的，所以认为这个是一个挺影响使用的bug。

bug.title: Deploying AddressServer reported an error and could not start
bug.body: Description: Field authManager in com.alibaba.nacos.core.auth.AuthFilter required a bean of type 'com.alibaba.nacos.core.auth.AuthManager' that could not be found. The injection point has the following annotations: - @org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired(required=true) Action: Consider defining a bean of type 'com.alibaba.nacos.core.auth.AuthManager' in your configuration

bug.title: mac 下 nacos 启动时加载 datum 的缓存文件出现 json 转换异常
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* or *feature request* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) nacos 启动时加载 datum 缓存文件报错，在 `com.alibaba.nacos.naming.consistency.persistent.raft.RaftStore#readDatum` 方法中加载目录~/nacos/data/naming/data 下的缓存文件时没有判断缓存文件是否为 nacos 生成的缓存，Mac 系统会自动生成 `.Ds_Store` 文件，导致在方法中的 `return JSON.parseObject(json, Datum.class);` 会报 json 转换异常。 Error loading datum cache file at Nacos startup, at `com.alibaba.nacos.Naming.consistency.persistent.Raft.RaftStore#readDatum` The method loads the cache file under directory ~/nacos/data/naming/data without determining whether the cache file is a nacos-generated cache. The Mac system automatically generates `.DS_Store` file, resulting in `return JSON.parseObject(json,Datum.class);` a json conversion exception will be reported. ### Describe what you expected to happen ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. 2. 3. ### Tell us your environment macOS Catalina 10.15.4 nacos-version: 1.3.0-BETA ### Anything else we need to know? 我想通过加后缀来解决这个问题。 I want to solve this problem by adding a suffix. @i will solve it@

bug.title: 配置权限后，点击无权限命名空间后页面一直loading，切换到有权限的空间仍继续loading，需要页面刷新才可以

bug.title: SQLException when config server quickstart
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) The sql in `com.alibaba.nacos.config.server.service.PersistService#listGroupKeyMd5ByPage()` miss return param `type` resulting in error when convert to bean by ConfigInfoWrapperRowMapper. > PreparedStatementCallback; uncategorized SQLException for SQL [ SELECT t.id,data_id,group_id,tenant_id,app_name,md5,gmt_modified FROM ( SELECT id FROM config_info ORDER BY id LIMIT ?,? ) g, config_info t WHERE g.id = t.id]; SQL state [S0022]; error code [0]; Column 'type' not found.; nested exception is java.sql.SQLException: Column 'type' not found. at com.alibaba.nacos.config.server.service.dump.DumpService.init(DumpService.java:141) at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method) at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62) at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43) at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:498) --- 使用到 ConfigInfoWrapperRowMapper 的部分sql 中缺少type返回,而该mapper需要此参数 其他几处由于未使用到而未触发，开启快速启动时不走全量dump会触发 ### Describe what you expected to happen ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. set isQuickStart=true 2. make sure nacos/status/heartBeat.txt exists so nacos will not start with allDump ### Tell us your environment ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: HealthCheckReactor is not isolated by namespace
bug.body: When you delete a service in page, HealthCheckReactor will delete other namespace service. then, offline instances of other namesapce cannot be deleted, because of ClientBeatCheckTask has been cancelled. task.taskKey() is servicename like "DEFAULT_GROUP@SERVICE_NAME". public static void cancelCheck(ClientBeatCheckTask task) { ScheduledFuture scheduledFuture = futureMap.get(task.taskKey()); if (scheduledFuture == null) { return; } try { scheduledFuture.cancel(true); } catch (Exception e) { Loggers.EVT_LOG.error("[CANCEL-CHECK] cancel failed!", e); } }

bug.title: Choose instance for nacos
bug.body:
code： 
 ...      try {          instance = namingService.selectOneHealthyInstance(name, Collections.singletonList(clusterName));      } catch (NacosException e) {                 log.warn("not find same clusterName instance ", e);      } ...
When clusterName instance not exist, thorws java.lang.IllegalStateException, catch NacosException is invalid. version: + springcloud Greenwich.SR2 + Spring Cloud Alibaba 2.1.0.RELEASE 在获取指定集群名称的实例时，我对NacosException进行了捕获，但是当集群中没有我要获取的微服务时，会抛出IllegalStateException，而非NacosException。但是明确要求用户捕获的是NacosException，不知道这样是不是对开发者体验有些不太友好

bug.title: Cannot support multiple IP addresses/port on a computer in cluster mode
bug.body: Sometimes, the developer have to set up clustering environment on a computer. There are two cases that can not be support. 1. Run multiple Nacos instance with the same IP address and different IP port on a computer. 2. Run multiple Nacos instance with multiple IP address and the same IP port on a computer (Spring boot will start web server bind all IP address by default). Please see my bug fixing with the following URL. https://github.com/michaelmao999/nacos/commit/2208a5e78048aefc1c8e6540c33477eaa4a353ae

bug.title: NACOS 1.0.0 failed to log out instance using API and restart after logout

bug.title: Nacos config can not convert to LinkedHashMap with true order
bug.body: My project used to use Spring Cloud (Eureka, Config), but now I want to switch to Spring Cloud with Alibaba (Nacos is applied first). However, during the process of using Nacos, I found that the configuration of Nacos will not be converted to LinkedHashMap in the specified order (Srping Config does not have this problem after testing). 我的项目原来使用Spring Cloud全家桶（包括Eureka、Config），现在想切换到Spring Cloud with Alibaba (首先应用的是Nacos)，但在使用的过程中发现，Nacos的配置转换到LinkedHashMap不会按照规定的顺序（经测试Srping Config不存在这个问题） Nacos Config 中Shiro的配置 （Shiro Config with Nacos） ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1745525/66469909-522d5f80-eabb-11e9-9fe7-008c6c5cc686.png) 实际获取配置的LinkedHashMap ( convert to LiknedHashMap situation ) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1745525/66470149-a0daf980-eabb-11e9-9d90-62f1dbfb9cbb.png) ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) Hopefully this will work with the Spring Config interface, as many applications will migrate directly from the Spring Cloud 希望效果与Spring Config接口，因为很多应用都会直接从Spring Cloud全家桶迁移进来 ### Describe what you expected to happen but just not same 与期望的有偏差 ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. 2. 3. ### Tell us your environment OS: MacOS JDK:1.8 Spring Cloud:2.1.0 Nacos: 1.1.3 ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: My cluster mode failed to succeed, 401 election failed
bug.body: 大佬您好 我得nacos集群报401，且页面默认密码nacos无法登陆 hostname已配置数据库及配置也已初始化成功 找不到原因 报错信息如下: 2019-09-29 15:18:00,000 WARN [IS LEADER] no leader is available now! 2019-09-29 15:18:02,616 INFO leader timeout, start voting,leader: null, term: 124 2019-09-29 15:18:33,861 ERROR Responding with unauthorized error. Message - Full authentication is required to access this resource 2019-09-29 15:18:38,251 INFO receive config info: unknown#172.16.2.84:8848#1569741518251#1 2019-09-29 15:18:38,254 WARN [STATUS-SYNCHRONIZE] failed to request serverStatus, remote server: 172.16.2.82:8848 2019-09-29 15:18:38,254 WARN [STATUS-SYNCHRONIZE] failed to request serverStatus, remote server: 172.16.2.83:8848 2019-09-29 15:18:02,618 ERROR NACOS-RAFT vote failed: {"timestamp":"2019-09-29T07:18:02.615+0000","status":401,"error":"Unauthorized","message":"Unauthorized","path":"/nacos/v1/ns/raft/vote"}, url: http://172.16.2.83:8848/nacos/v1/ns/raft/vote 2019-09-29 15:18:02,619 ERROR NACOS-RAFT vote failed: {"timestamp":"2019-09-29T07:18:02.615+0000","status":401,"error":"Unauthorized","message":"Unauthorized","path":"/nacos/v1/ns/raft/vote"}, url: http://172.16.2.82:8848/nacos/v1/ns/raft/vote

bug.title: Switching from wifi to broadband network cable during local computer development; registration ip error
bug.body: (一) ip注册错误问题 启动时192.168.235.1 注册到了 nacos; 发现ip未在本地局域网网段, 直接换上有线后 电脑ip变为 192.168.2.29 ;但是重启项目后 nacos还是235.1 删除nacos的服务列表,重启电脑等各种手段后也没有变化; 最后 临时配置文件将ip 写死 重启nacos显示ip为192.168.2.29;终于恢复正常 (二) 通过gateway不能访问到服务; 必须调用 网关的actuator/gateway/refresh接口 后才能正常调用; --不知道这个问题跟nacos有没有关系 版本是: springboot: 2.1.4.RELEASE spring-cloud: Greenwich.SR1 nacos: 1.1.3 cloud gateway: 2.1.0.RELEASE

bug.title: [BUG] config type will always be reset the text when do clone config
bug.body: ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) config type will be reset the text when I clone config from one namespace to another namespace. ### Describe what you expected to happen clone config and all the properties will be transferred from one namespace to another namespace. ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. clone one config from namespace A to namespace B. 2. the config type will be reset the text. ### Tell us your environment OS: Centos 7 Nacos: 1.1.3 ### Anything else we need to know? when I want to fix #1881 I found this bug

bug.title: [BUG] config description will be lost when do clone config
bug.body: ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) config description will be lost when I clone config from one namespace to another namespace. ### Describe what you expected to happen clone config and all the properties will be transferred from one namespace to another namespace. ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. clone one config from namespace A to namespace B. 2. the config description in namespace B will be lost. ### Tell us your environment OS: Centos 7 Nacos: 1.1.3 ### Anything else we need to know? Nacos is not downloaded from the release page. I compile the code and run it.

bug.title: The subscribers function of Service Management can't return the right subscriber list on cluster mode
bug.body: After looking at the code, I found that the return error was written when the synchronization loop got the subscriber. see com.alibaba.nacos.naming.core.SubscribeManager.getSubscribers() method, at 92 line. ### Tell us your environment Nacos 1.1.3 version thank you.

bug.title: Dubbo external configuration cannot achieved loadbalance
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) In Dubbo environment, once dubbo. protocol. port is configured in the external configuration, load balancing cannot be achieved. The same configuration can achieve load balancing by configuring dubbo. protocol. port locally and without configuring dubbo. protocol. port externally. ### Describe what you expected to happen In Dubbo environment, dubbo. protocol. port is configurated in the external configuration, which can realize load balancing of random policy in Dubbo. ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. Create a project in Dubbo environment to create a unified dependency management 2. Creating service providers and service consumers 3. Make Dubbo's External Configuration ### Tell us your environment <dubbo.version>2.7.3</dubbo.version> <dubbo-kryo.version>2.7.3</dubbo-kryo.version> <dubbo-actuator.version>2.7.3</dubbo-actuator.version> <spring-cloud.version>Greenwich.RELEASE</spring-cloud.version> <spring-cloud-alibaba.version>0.9.0.RELEASE</spring-cloud-alibaba.version> <alibaba-spring-context-support.version>1.0.2</alibaba-spring-context-support.version> ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: NamingProxy beat sender,failed to req API,cause: param
bug.body: when I start my application in EDAS , It ' always send beat error like after contents: 2019-09-18 14:34:07.667 [gylxt-supplier-test-48e09fa1-2542-48ea-98f7-793193239d6c-69ck7f] [my-supplier] [ERROR] [com.alibaba.nacos.naming.beat.sender] naming - [CLIENT-BEAT] failed to send beat: {"cluster":"DEFAULT","ip":"192.168.0.45","metadata":{"preserved.register.source":"SPRING_CLOUD"},"port":8080,"scheduled":true,"serviceName":"DEFAULT_GROUP@@supplier","weight":1.0} java.lang.IllegalStateException: failed to req API:/nacos/v1/ns/instance/beat after all servers([100.100.21.44, 100.100.0.46]) tried: failed to req API:http://100.100.21.44:8848/nacos/v1/ns/instance/beat. code:400 msg: caused: param 'app' is required; but when I search the nacos's source, there isn't a check of param "app", the beatCheck have checked param 'beat' ,the source is like this : String beat = WebUtils.required(request, "beat"); and in my local environment, All of this is ok，my nacos-discovery version is com.alibaba.cloud 2.0.0-RELEASE 在阿里云edas容器部署的spring cloud 程序的时候，总是报错发送心跳失败，报错如下： 2019-09-18 14:34:07.667 [gylxt-supplier-test-48e09fa1-2542-48ea-98f7-793193239d6c-69ck7f] [my-supplier] [ERROR] [com.alibaba.nacos.naming.beat.sender] naming - [CLIENT-BEAT] failed to send beat: {"cluster":"DEFAULT","ip":"192.168.0.45","metadata":{"preserved.register.source":"SPRING_CLOUD"},"port":8080,"scheduled":true,"serviceName":"DEFAULT_GROUP@@supplier","weight":1.0} java.lang.IllegalStateException: failed to req API:/nacos/v1/ns/instance/beat after all servers([100.100.21.44, 100.100.0.46]) tried: failed to req API:http://100.100.21.44:8848/nacos/v1/ns/instance/beat. code:400 msg: caused: param 'app' is required; 但是查询nacos-all服务端源码的时候，并没有查到有关于 参数 'app'的校验，在心跳部分校验的时候，校验的参数名称是 "beat" ,相关源码是： String beat = WebUtils.required(request, "beat"); 请问下是跟edas提供的默认注册中心版本有关系还是？ 本地用的是 nacos-discovery 2.0.0-RELEASE版本

bug.title: No configuration /error is accessible in WebSecurityConfig, resulting in real error loss
bug.body: SpringBoot 默认配置了 /error 页面, tomcat 发现错误的时候, 如果配置了错误页面,就会转发到错误页面, 然后又经过过滤器, 安全过滤器发现 /error页面没有授权, 所以一直是 401 错误, com.alibaba.nacos.naming.misc.HttpClient 在401请求中又没有拿到输入流, 抛出500, 其实它想汇报的是 400的错误。 建议设置 ``com.alibaba.nacos.console.config.WebSecurityConfig`` 中设置 /error 可访问 或者不要使用 `` resp.sendError(400,"error message") `` 换成 `` resp.setStatus(400); `` `` resp.getWriter().write("error message"); `` 服务器访问自己抛出400异常 com.alibaba.nacos.naming.web.DistroFilter ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13413715/64678454-2c0ca380-d4ac-11e9-8b9b-4071f84b4708.png) 出现异常tomcat转发到/error页面，被Security拦截，抛出401异常 com.alibaba.nacos.console.config.WebSecurityConfig ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13413715/64678023-4db95b00-d4ab-11e9-8532-cd1d2b3dff62.png) HttpClient收到401状态码，输入流是null，解析输入流抛出500异常，本应该是400的异常却变成了500异常，导致排查问题困难。巨坑！！！ com.alibaba.nacos.naming.misc.HttpClient ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13413715/64678056-6b86c000-d4ab-11e9-9104-bb7cf4580e7f.png)

bug.title: Error creating cache directory at startup time [starting the time register to create a cache directory error]
bug.body: ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) Error creating cache directory at startup time 启动时报建立缓存目录错误 ### Describe what you expected to happen Occasionally reporting cache creation errors at startup,The error message is as follows: 启动时偶发性报建立缓存错误,错误信息如下： java.lang.IllegalStateException: failed to create cache dir: /root/nacos/naming/public at com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.cache.DiskCache.makeSureCacheDirExists(DiskCache.java:155) ~[nacos-client-1.0.0.jar!/:na] at com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.cache.DiskCache.write(DiskCache.java:45) ~[nacos-client-1.0.0.jar!/:na] ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 启动 ### Tell us your environment centos 7、java8 ### Anything else we need to know? com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.cache.DiskCache类里面 第49行第50行的注释做了多实例冲突的优化处理，然而第153行同样的场景却未做同样的优化处理。 Inside the com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.cache.DiskCache class The comment in line 49, line 50, optimizes multi-instance conflicts, but the same scenario in line 153 does not.

bug.title: Packing can't run
bug.body: ## Issue Description bug report: 这个打包项目，打出来的包，跑不起来，conf下的配置文件不起作用，项目跑起来使用的还是jar内的application.properties

bug.title: In modifying service instance page.Error information not clear
bug.body: ## Issue Description Error information not clear(feature request) ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) When modifying service instance detail incorrectly，just inform you "instance format invalid".It's not clear.You don't know why ,and how to modify. ### Describe what you expected to happen Make error information more specifically ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1.add specifically error information in code. ### Tell us your environment nacos-all 1.1.3 ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: some threads cant not be stop when stop tomcat [...but has failed to stop it. This is very likely to create a memory leak...]
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* or *feature request* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) when app is stop normally, logs warn that some threads can not be closed. many threads are about nacos client 当我关闭tomcat时，应用日志警告有一些线程不能关闭。多数是关于nacos client的线程。 ### Describe what you expected to happen when i stop app using shutdown.sh or shutdown.bat of tomcat, all app threads will be stopped and tomcat process can not be found any more 当我通过tomcat的shutdown.sh 或者 shutdown.bat 关闭应用时，应用全部线程都应该被关闭，tomcat 的进程也不再被发现在进程列表里。 ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) no need to run nacos server, only nacos client is ok 不用运行nacos server，只要运行客户端，客户端可以只有一个springboot 启动类即可 use tomcat 如果使用外置tomcat: 1.build a app with nacos client, and make war, and put it into webapps of tomcat 1. 任意构建一个使用nacos client 的app,打成war包，放到tomcat的webapps下 2.run startup.bat or startup.sh of tomcat 2. 执行tomcat的startup.bat或startup.sh 3.run shutdown.bat or shutdown.sh of tomcat 3. 执行tomcat的shutdown.bat或shutdown.sh use embed-tomcat of springboot 如果使用springboot自带tomcat 1.build a app with nacos client, and make jar 1. 任意构建一个使和nacos client 的app,打成jar包 2.run java -jar xxx.jar 2. 执行 java -jar xxx.jar 3.when xxx.jar is fully up, do not stop it, run java -jar xxx.jar again, and then it will warn address is in use, and warn thread can not be stoped 3. 等应用xxx.jar启动完成后，不要关闭，再次执行 java -jar xxx.jar，这时会提示端口冲突，内置tomcat会尝试关闭，并警告有线程不能停止 ### Tell us your environment springboot2.1.4 springcloud Greenwich.SR2 spring-cloud-alibaba-dependencies 2.1.0 tomcat 8.5.45 ### Anything else we need to know? bug.title: Tomcat deployment war cannot implement automatic registration service
bug.body: 我用了1.1.0版本，sca用了最新版本，其中registration.setPort()方法显示过期了。类似#341的问题，但#341中提供的两种方式在新版本都无效。

bug.title: There is a bug in the console to add HTML type configuration
bug.body: ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) When adding a html type configuration through the console, the parameter "type" is sent to the server as "text/html", which causes a problem to be displayed when editing this configuration through the console. ### Describe what you expected to happen ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. 2. 3. ### Tell us your environment Nacos Version : 1.1.3 ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: How to remove unavailable services
bug.body: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36101454/63749587-55d79f00-c8de-11e9-84de-8f37bf0b3d16.png) 这个服务不能关闭，也不能下线 The service cannot be turned off or offline

bug.title: Console revenue box cannot blur search
bug.body: install nacos server1.1.3 with docker，at console DataId and Group can not fuzzy search 使用docker安装nacos server1.1.3，控制台页面DataId和Group不能模糊搜索，只是精准匹配

bug.title: When the registration service is registered in version 1.1.3, the console cannot find the service problem.
bug.body: 本地启动nacos 服务1.1.3，使用sofa集成nacos 我使用的client 和api都是1.1.3，debug到NamingProxy中后（返回200），nacos控制台显示不出来注册的服务，后把client和api回退到0.6.0启动应用，能查出来，进过源码比对，0.6.0版本的注册时使用的是put方法，1.1.3版本使用的是post方法，感觉好奇怪，注册服务到nacos中的方法看结果应该是put，但是为什么最新的api是post？还是我的使用过程中有问题？

bug.title: still get the instance after register twice and deregister
bug.body: ## Issue Description i use namingService to register a instance, somehow i register a same instance twice, after i degister this instance, this instance is still in nacos Type: bug report ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) when i debug the program, I found that after i degister this instance, i can see the beatTask is removed from dom2Beat map, but i found there is still a beatTask running to send beatInfo to nacos server, as i see, every time register a instance will cause a new BeatInfo created, and this new BeatInfo will override the old one in dom2beat map, but the old one is not cancelled, so when i deregister this instance, the old beatTask still send beatInfo to nacos server,this will cause register again. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5326814/63359291-0e618800-c39f-11e9-8e3e-cb965837f2cc.png) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5326814/63395999-316c5600-c3f8-11e9-863b-4c4664407fb6.png) ### Describe what you expected to happen when add beatInfo , we should consider if there is already exist one, and cancel it

bug.title: Nacos Config cannot automatically refresh attribute values
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description *bug report*:In standalone environment, Nacos Config can not automatically refresh any configuration file data changes after performing the operation of changing "spring. datasource. druid. url" in the case of custom namespace. ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) Before modifying the value of "spring.datasource.druid.url" of yaml file, modify other properties of yaml file. The @RefreshScope+@Value in service can be refreshed automatically normally. After modifying the value of "spring.datasource.druid.url" of yaml file, @Value ("${spring.datasource.druid.url}") has not been automatically updated, and any other @Value value has been changed. Can not update automatically normally; ### Describe what you expected to happen @ RefreshScope + @Value should normally automatically refresh attribute values ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. 2. 3. ### Tell us your environment standalone ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: Can't get config data when tenant is Public and mode is standalone-mysql
bug.body: ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) Can't get config data when tenant is Public and mode is standalone-mysql ### Describe what you expected to happen I debug the nacos client code, here is the request URL ##http://192.168.125.105:8848/nacos/v1/cs/configs?dataId=dubbo-consumer-dev.yaml&group=DEFAULT_GROUP&tenant=Public## I debug the nacos server code and find the bug's position class:PersistService ## public ConfigInfo findConfigInfo(final String dataId, final String group, final String tenant) { //bug: when tenant is "Public", tenant_id is null in table config_info final String tenantTmp = StringUtils.isBlank(tenant) ? StringUtils.EMPTY : tenant; try { return this.jt.queryForObject( "SELECT ID,data_id,group_id,tenant_id,app_name,content,md5 FROM config_info WHERE data_id=? AND group_id=? AND tenant_id=?", new Object[]{dataId, group, tenantTmp}, CONFIG_INFO_ROW_MAPPER); } catch (EmptyResultDataAccessException e) { // 表明数据不存在, 返回null return null; } catch (CannotGetJdbcConnectionException e) { fatalLog.error("[db-error] " + e.toString(), e); throw e; } } ## ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. model is standalone-mysql 2. Namespace is Public ### Tell us your environment ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: Update service description error in Open API Guide
bug.body: ## Issue Description Type: *document error* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) Update service description error in Open API Guide Document url: https://nacos.io/en-us/docs/open-api.html#Update service Error description: `protectThreshold` and `healthCheckMode` is not required ### Describe what you expected to happen `protectThreshold` and `healthCheckMode` is required ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. See document: https://nacos.io/en-us/docs/open-api.html#Update service 2. Execute `curl -X PUT '127.0.0.1:8848/nacos/v1/ns/service?serviceName=nacos.test.2` ### Tell us your environment My local version is `tag: 0.9.0` ### Anything else we need to know? Latest branch `develop` source code show just `protectThreshold` is required: https://github.com/alibaba/nacos/blob/11bd0ccd7685636a297a1f18e1e508d18d0ae7c7/naming/src/main/java/com/alibaba/nacos/naming/controllers/ServiceController.java#L240

bug.title: Nacos connect to server with domain default to add port 8848 causing error
bug.body: Does the Nacos client have to communicate with the server using ip:port? When I use the ip:port corresponding to the domain name, the client connection Nacos is added with port 8848 by default, causing the connection to be rejected. Is there a way for the client to communicate with the server using domain and port 80? Nacos客户端是不是必须使用ip:port的方式与服务端进行通信？当我使用域名反代对应的ip:port后，客户端连接Nacos默认被加上了8848端口，导致连接被拒绝。有没有办法让客户端使用domain和80端口与服务端进行通信。 比如：10.1.123.12:8848 被反代为 nacos.rr.me，这时候客户端通信时变成了 nacos.rr.me:8848

bug.title: reporting heartbeat failure
bug.body: When nacos and springcloud are used together, the registered temporary instance will occasionally have a 'code 500, connection timeout' error when reporting the heartbeat. I don't know if it is caused by multiple instances of a service or some other reason. (failed to req API : ... code:500 msg: ... such as socket connection timeout with nacos nodes) 当nacos和springcloud一起使用时,注册上去的临时实例在上报心跳时会不定时的频繁出现'code 500,connection timeout'的错误,不知道是因为一个服务多个实例导致的还是其他的一些原因. Nacos runs in cluster mode, the network between nodes and the network of the client and nacos cluster are very stable. nacos运行在集群模式下,各节点间的网络情况和客户端与nacos集群的网络情况非常稳定. Nacos Version --- 1.1.0 Spring Cloud Version --- Spring Cloud Greenwich Spring Cloud Alibaba Version --- 0.9.0.RELEASE Spring Boot Version --- 2.1.5.RELEASE

17:32:45,005 WARN [IS LEADER] no leader is available now! 2019-07-23 17:32:46,397 INFO leader timeout, start voting,leader: null, term: 0 2019-07-23 17:33:00,000 WARN [IS LEADER] no leader is available now! 2019-07-23 17:33:02,396 INFO leader timeout, start voting,leader: null, term: 1` And when client service regist to nacos , its got exception of `java.lang.IllegalStateException: failed to req API:/nacos/v1/ns/instance after all servers([121.201.65.156:8848]) tried at com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.net.NamingProxy.reqAPI(NamingProxy.java:374) at Some properties in application.properties are setting as below: `nacos.inetutils.ip-address=192.168.122.1 nacos.inetutils.use-only-site-local-interfaces=true nacos.inetutils.preferred-networks[0]=192.168.122. nacos.inetutils.preferred-networks[0]=192.168.122.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\\d|((1d{2})|([1-9]?\\d))),30.5.124.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\\d|((1d{2})|([1-9]?\\d)))` Anyone can tell me what's the matter? how to correct it ?

bug.title: Nacos Server1.1.0 cluster mode cluster.conf cannot be started normally using hostname
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description bug report Nacos Server1.1.0，集群模式，cluster.conf里面配置主机名无法正常启动 cluster.conf里的配置如下，主机名与IP的映射均在hosts里正常配置，hostname -i可正常显示IP zk-test-app1 zk-test-app2 zk-test-app3 启动naming-server.log报错如下异常： 2019-07-22 16:54:25,768 WARN [STATUS-SYNCHRONIZE] failed to request serviceStatus, remote server: zk-test-app1:8848 2019-07-22 16:54:25,770 WARN [STATUS-SYNCHRONIZE] failed to request serviceStatus, remote server: zk-test-app3:8848 2019-07-22 16:54:25,771 WARN [STATUS-SYNCHRONIZE] failed to request serviceStatus, remote server: zk-test-app2:8848 2019-07-22 16:54:26,692 ERROR got exception. ip: 10.32.233.222:8848 is not in serverlist com.alibaba.nacos.naming.exception.NacosException: ip: 10.32.233.222:8848 is not in serverlist at com.alibaba.nacos.naming.controllers.ServiceController.serviceStatus(ServiceController.java:309) at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor74.invoke(Unknown Source) at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43) at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:498) at org.springframework.web.method.support.InvocableHandlerMethod.doInvoke(InvocableHandlerMethod.java:189) ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) 集群的节点无法正常选举成功，服务不可用 ### Describe what you expected to happen 应该正常启动并选举成功 ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. cluster.conf使用主机名配置 ### Tell us your environment Redhat Enterprise Linux X64 Oracle JDK x64 8u191 ### Anything else we need to know? 如果cluster.conf改成IP列表能正常启动成功

bug.title: The bug encountered when upgrading nacos to mysql8
bug.body: The latest source code for nacos has been adapted to mysql8.x, but if you use mysql8.x, the "db.url.0" configuration parameter of the "nacos-default.properties" file of the source code should also be adapted. If you still use the configuration parameters, the startup process will report an error. ## Issue Description Type: bug report ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) ### Describe what you expected to happen ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. Change the mysql driver version of the parent file "pom.xml" to "8.0.11" 2. Run the Nacos.java file。 3. Watch the console ### Tell us your environment ### Anything else we need to know? When the "BasicDataSourceServiceImpl.java" file reads the mysql connection, it is recommended to determine whether it is the latest mysql version by the driver, so as to select the correct "db.url.0" parameter. In addition, it should prompt the user to select the correct mysql connection in a production environment.

bug.title: @NacosConfigListener when spring init,the remote config can't be read
bug.body: ` @NacosConfigListener(dataId = "taskjob.json", groupId = "tpsp", converter = TaskScheduleConverter.class) public void setTaskJobBOList(List<TaskJobConfigDTO> taskJobList) { TpspLogger.applicationInfoLog(logger, "update task-info.....start"); TpspLogger.applicationInfoLog(logger, "nacos.dataId[=taskjob.json].groupId[=tpsp]", taskJobList); //update task updateTaskList(taskJobList); TpspLogger.applicationInfoLog(logger, "update task-info.....end"); }` this is my code, when spring init，the method don't run to read config; but, when i change the config on the nacos-admin, it works. when i change the config ,the listener works and inits tasklist

bug.title: The Doc has some errors
bug.body: In LINUX "sh startup.sh -m standalone" is wrong. because [[]] is bash's feature, so it should be ```bash bash startup.sh -m standalone ``` And where should I put it into a dir? The nacos doesn't support "root" or "sudo".

bug.title: Time of servers not synchronized cause data inconsistent
bug.body: If any of the Nacos servers has different time compared to other servers (delay or advance by 30 seconds), it will refuse to update data from other servers.

bug.title: #1352 Private network can't load fonts, favicon
bug.body: #1352 Private network can't load fonts, favicon In fact, this problem has not been completely solved. Under the service list label, the new service and the pop-up box still have the word ali cdn. It is doubtful whether it has been tested before pr.

bug.title: PostConstruct excute order cause BasicDataSourceServiceImpl init error.
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description Type: bug report ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) Reason: BasicDataSourceServiceImpl::init may excute before PropertyUtil::init. Problem: I start nacos with "-Dnacos.standalone=true" and "spring.datasource.platform=mysql", but nacos still run on derby. ![nacos-bug](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23392703/60880263-eb0ecd80-a275-11e9-9ed2-cbaccb518cf8.PNG) ### Describe what you expected to happen nacos uses standalone mode and run on mysql. ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. debug com.alibaba.nacos.Nacos 2. set VM options:-Dnacos.standalone=true 3. add spring.datasource.platform=mysql in applicatiion.properties ### Tell us your environment windows 8.1, jdk 11 ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: nacos-config-spring-environment bugfix
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description Type: bug report <!-- *bug report* or *feature request* --> ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) What happens to configuration file strings when using spring in multiple environments is that the configuration in the default environment is simply read from another environment. This is a serious problem ### Describe what you expected to happen Isolate the spring environment ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. add application.yml add application-test.yml 2. application.yml Middle add configuration ``spring:cloud:nacos:discovery:namespace:xxxxxx`` 3.run springboot applicationContext add runtime config ``-Dspring.profiles.active=test`` You will find that he can read the namespace in application.yml ### Tell us your environment macOS-10.14.3 (18D42) oracle jdk 1.8.0_111 springframework 5.1.7.release springboot 2.1.5.release spring-cloud-alibaba-nacos-discovery-0.9.0.release ### Anything else we need to know? The individual eyeballs did not use the spring context to initialize it, resulting in configuration inconsistencies

bug.title: beat error for ephemeral instances with same serviceName, groupName, ip and port but with different clusterName
bug.body: ## Issue Description bug report ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) env: nacos clusters of 3 servers i create 3 ephemeral instances with same serviceName, groupName, ip and port but with different clusterName. However, i found out that only one instance could send the beat and others become unhealthy and are deleted when timed out. reason: map dom2beat build the key using the combination of serviceName, groupName, ip and port, causing all the instances have the same key, with the latter beatinfo overriding the former. ### Describe what you expected to happen please help to solve this problem.

bug.title: Connect mysql8 error in windows environment
bug.body: 将mysql8驱动放到plugins下，在windows下启动依然会报错，在startup.cmd没有关于plugins的扫描项。

bug.title: NamingMaintainService updateInstance can't update instance enable status
bug.body: ## Issue Description Type: *bug request* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) bug: NamingMaintainService can't modify instance enable status ### Describe what you expected to happen NamingMaintainService shoud support modify instance enable status ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) ### Tell us your environment ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: AsyncNotifyService bugfix and optimization
bug.body: The problem in `AsyncNotifyService.class` may need to be fixed 1. The log parameters are incorrect, causing the log to not output as expected. 2. Creates an useless Object array object when the log is used because variable parameters are already supported. 3. Spelling mistake. 4. Multiple repetitions of code can be optimized.

bug.title: Too much error logs if service does not exist
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description Type: *feature request* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) When request to `com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.NacosNamingService#getAllInstances(java.lang.String, java.util.List<java.lang.String>)`, if the service does not exist, the following exception stackstrace will be thrown: ``` ErrCode:500,ErrMsg:failed to req API:http://127.0.0.1:8848/nacos/v1/ns/instance/list. code:404 msg: service not found: DEFAULT_GROUP@@configurators:org.apache.dubbo.demo.DemoService:1.0.0.test:xxxxxxx at com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.net.NamingProxy.callServer(NamingProxy.java:340) at com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.net.NamingProxy.reqAPI(NamingProxy.java:367) at com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.net.NamingProxy.reqAPI(NamingProxy.java:304) at com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.net.NamingProxy.queryList(NamingProxy.java:217) at com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.core.HostReactor.updateServiceNow(HostReactor.java:273) at com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.core.HostReactor.getServiceInfo(HostReactor.java:232) at com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.NacosNamingService.getAllInstances(NacosNamingService.java:373) at com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.NacosNamingService.getAllInstances(NacosNamingService.java:365) at com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.NacosNamingService.getAllInstances(NacosNamingService.java:354) at com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.NacosNamingService.getAllInstances(NacosNamingService.java:334) at org.apache.dubbo.registry.nacos.NacosRegistry.lambda$doSubscribe$3(NacosRegistry.java:169) ``` ### Describe what you expected to happen Do not log the errors, but throw the exception to the caller. Let the caller to decide how to handle the exception. ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. Start a Dubbo provider with NacosRegistry, version 2.7.3-SNAPSHOT 2. Start a Dubbo consumer, with NacosRegistry, version 2.7.3-SNAPSHOT 3. You will see lots of error logs go output every few seconds. ### Tell us your environment MacOS + Java 11 ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: cmdb project can't start alone
bug.body: the SpringBoot cmdb project can't start alone ,because of maven resource excludes application.properties it should be canceled.

bug.title: cmdb can't start alone
bug.body: the SpringBoot project cmdb can't start alone ,because of the maven resources config : <resource> <directory>src/main/resources</directory> <excludes> <exclude>application.properties</exclude> </excludes> </resource> it should be canceled.

bug.title: nacos config [notify-error] from c.a.nacos.client.config.impl.CacheData
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description When putting an method annotated by @EventListener(classes = RefreshEvent.class) in a class annotated by @Controller, @Configuration or similar, Class c.a.nacos.client.config.impl.CacheData will throw [notify-error], and then a nacos config client cannot get the notification of property updates from a nacos server. 2019-06-26 05:07:45.701 ERROR 23164 --- [99-9d32359662c7] c.a.nacos.client.config.impl.CacheData : [fixed-192.168.66.100_8848-ad23a4bc-49f7-4767-9499-9d32359662c7] [notify-error] dataId=ds.properties, group=DEFAULT_GROUP, md5=3291c3174cb4401d1a4d01981a5ca91b, listener=org.springframework.cloud.alibaba.nacos.refresh.NacosContextRefresher$1@3c58d8e1 tx=null @EventListener is from org.springframework.context.event.EventListener . Type: *bug report* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) cannot get updated properties ### Describe what you expected to happen get the notification event or property refreshment event. ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. 2. 3. ### Tell us your environment config client: windows 10 config server: linux, standalone using spring-cloud-alibaba ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: Too many error logs in naming-server.log in nacos-server
bug.body: ## Issue Description Type: *feature request* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) Too many error logs in `naming-server.log` in nacos-server ! （more than 10K lines per second of exception error stack） Should change log level from "ERROR" to "WARN". because these NacosException in `com.alibaba.nacos.naming.controllers` is not **nacos system error** or **some error cause by nacos service**. Usually we can return error code when some application subscribe non-existent config. ### Describe what you expected to happen Expect print "WARN" log level for `com.alibaba.nacos.naming.controllers` throws NacosException as follows： ```java com.alibaba.nacos.naming.exception.ResponseExceptionHandler#handleNacosException before: Loggers.SRV_LOG.error("got exception. {}", e.getErrorMsg(), e); after: Loggers.SRV_LOG.warn("got exception. {}", e.getErrorMsg(), e); ``` ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. Start a demo under guild of https://nacos.io/en-us/docs/use-nacos-with-dubbo.html 2. Watch `naming-server.log` form nacos server ### Tell us your environment JDK1.8 dubbo 2.7.2 Nacos 1.0.0

bug.title: Yaml format configuration file color rendering bug
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> yaml格式配置文件如果为长字符串，需要使用英文双引号，nacos显示自动换行，字符串中间包含冒号，长字符串后的配置项均渲染错误 ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* or *feature request* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) spring: cloud: gateway: filter: secure-headers: content-security-policy: "default-src 'self' https:; font-src 'self' https: data:; img-src 'self' https: data:; object-src 'none'; script-src https:; style-src 'self' https: 'unsafe-inline'" test: 123 #<---这行开始颜色渲染出错 ### Describe what you expected to happen ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. 2. 3. ### Tell us your environment nacos 1.0.1 ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: bug or my mistake?
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* or *feature request* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) 1、start springboot , inject field like userLocalCache,name,gg . (666,444,555) 2、change properties by nacos. (userLocalxx=333,name=111,gg=22) 3、println(userLocalCache,name,gg) ===> 333,444,555, acturl ---> 333,111,222 ### Describe what you expected to happen up ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) ``` @Controller @NacosPropertySource(dataId = "nacos-config.properties", groupId = "DEFAULT_GROUP", autoRefreshed = true) @RequestMapping("config") @Slf4j public class ConfigController implements CommandLineRunner { @NacosValue(value = "${useLocalCache:false}", autoRefreshed = true) private String useLocalCache; @NacosValue(value = "${name:陈顺}", autoRefreshed = true) private String name; @NacosValue(value = "${gg:gg}", autoRefreshed = true) private String gg; public ConfigController() { } public void setUseLocalCache(String useLocalCache) { this.useLocalCache = useLocalCache; } @NacosInjected private NamingService namingService; @RequestMapping(value = "/get") @ResponseBody public Object get() throws NacosException { return namingService.getAllInstances("aaa"); } @RequestMapping(value = "/ddd") @ResponseBody public Object ddd() { return useLocalCache; } @Override public void run(String... args) throws Exception { // while (true) { Thread.sleep(4000); // log.info("[NacosConfigAnnoatationService]注解方式获取到的配置项目,useLocalCache={},name={},gg={} ", useLocalCache, name, gg); // } } @Override public String toString() { return "ConfigController{" + "useLocalCache='" + useLocalCache + '\'' + ", name='" + name + '\'' + ", gg='" + gg + '\'' + '}'; } } ``` pom# SpringBoot 2.1.4.RELEASE ``` <dependency> <groupId>com.alibaba.boot</groupId> <artifactId>nacos-config-spring-boot-starter</artifactId> <version>0.2.0</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.alibaba.boot</groupId> <artifactId>nacos-config-spring-boot-actuator</artifactId> <version>0.2.0</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.alibaba.boot</groupId> <artifactId>nacos-discovery-spring-boot-starter</artifactId> <version>0.2.0</version> </dependency> ``` ### Tell us your environment Mac os x ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26037282/59756792-09a82700-92bd-11e9-81f5-65a3c6edfa93.png)

bug.title: Problem of RegistryDirectory.notify method won't be invoked
bug.body: Hi guys, I met a problem which I could not fix out. I have set the property of "check" of @Reference annotation to false, then run the consumer first to register it into the Nacos registry center. After that, I start to run the provider which my consumer referenced. When all those things are done, I start to invoke my hello-world method which contains the referenced method of provider side, then I received an Error response with "No provider available" message. I have checked the method of RegistryDirectory.doList() , and found methodInvokerMap property was empty. Also, I have checked the method of RegistryDirectory.notify() and debugged it, found it won't be invoked whatever provider is registered into the Nacos registry center or deregistered from there. Blowing is the main configuration of my project: pom.xml file > <dependency> <groupId>com.alibaba</groupId> <artifactId>dubbo</artifactId> <version>2.6.6</version> <exclusions> <exclusion> <artifactId>netty</artifactId> <groupId>org.jboss.netty</groupId> </exclusion> </exclusions> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.alibaba</groupId> <artifactId>dubbo-registry-nacos</artifactId> <version>2.6.6</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.alibaba.nacos</groupId> <artifactId>nacos-client</artifactId> <version>1.0.0</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.alibaba.spring</groupId> <artifactId>spring-context-support</artifactId> <version>1.0.2</version> </dependency> applicationContext.xml > <dubbo:annotation package="com.test.dubbo"/> <dubbo:application name="dubboTest" owner="mams" organization="mams"> <dubbo:parameter key="qos.enable" value="false"/> </dubbo:application> <dubbo:registry address="nacos://localhost:8848"/> Thanks for helping

bug.title: Nacos V1.0.0 console Close health check failed
bug.body: 中：单机模式，linux环境，使用 curl -X POST 'http://127.0.0.1:8848/nacos/v1/ns/instance?serviceName=nacos.naming.serviceName&ip=20.18.7.10&port=8080' 注册服务，在控制台-服务管理-服务列表-服务详情-集群-集群配置，选择检查类型为none关闭健康检查。然后不生效，F12发现请求500了。 请求路径：/nacos/v1/ns/cluster 返回结果：org.springframework.web.util.NestedServletException: Handler dispatch failed; nested exception is java.lang.IncompatibleClassChangeError: com.alibaba.nacos.api.naming.pojo.AbstractHealthChecker and com.alibaba.nacos.api.naming.pojo.AbstractHealthChecker$None disagree on InnerClasses attribute EN：Stand-alone mode, linux environment, use curl -X POST 'http://127.0.0.1:8848/nacos/v1/ns/instance?serviceName=nacos.naming.serviceName&ip=20.18.7.10&port=8080' To register the service, in the Console - Service Management - Service List - Service Details - Cluster - Cluster Configuration, select the check type as none to turn off the health check. Then it does not take effect, F12 finds request 500. Request path: /nacos/v1/ns/cluster Returns: org.springframework.web.util.NestedServletException: Handler dispatch failed; nested exception is java.lang.IncompatibleClassChangeError: com.alibaba.nacos.api.naming.pojo.AbstractHealthChecker and com.alibaba.nacos.api.naming. pojo.AbstractHealthChecker$None disagree on InnerClasses attribute ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30221101/59322198-ad1a9a00-8d07-11e9-8af5-becfb96b51e4.png) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30221101/59322213-bf94d380-8d07-11e9-8b14-15fc91d8c844.png) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30221101/59322225-cc192c00-8d07-11e9-8cc7-b8694de3cca6.png)

bug.title: Source code compilation method compiled nacos-common error, plug-in version is too old
bug.body: MVN插件版本source和target的版本是6，而core等都已经改成7了，6在编译时候会报错过久，请选用7或更新

bug.title: Always failed when update instance healthy status
bug.body: ```java @CanDistro @RequestMapping(value = {"", "/instance"}, method = RequestMethod.PUT) public String update(HttpServletRequest request) throws Exception { String namespaceId = WebUtils.optional(request, CommonParams.NAMESPACE_ID, Constants.DEFAULT_NAMESPACE_ID); String serviceName = WebUtils.required(request, CommonParams.SERVICE_NAME); String clusterName = WebUtils.optional(request, CommonParams.CLUSTER_NAME , UtilsAndCommons.DEFAULT_CLUSTER_NAME); String ip = WebUtils.required(request, "ip"); int port = Integer.parseInt(WebUtils.required(request, "port")); boolean valid = false; String healthyString = WebUtils.optional(request, "healthy", StringUtils.EMPTY); if (StringUtils.isBlank(healthyString)) { healthyString = WebUtils.optional(request, "valid", StringUtils.EMPTY); } if (StringUtils.isBlank(healthyString)) { throw new IllegalArgumentException("Param 'healthy' is required."); } Service service = serviceManager.getService(namespaceId, serviceName); // Only health check "none" need update health status with api if (HealthCheckType.NONE.name().equals(service.getClusterMap().get(clusterName).getHealthChecker().getType())) { for (Instance instance : service.allIPs(Lists.newArrayList(clusterName))) { if (instance.getIp().equals(ip) && instance.getPort() == port) { instance.setHealthy(valid); Loggers.EVT_LOG.info((valid ? "[IP-ENABLED]" : "[IP-DISABLED]") + " ips: " + instance.getIp() + ":" + instance.getPort() + "@" + instance.getClusterName() + ", service: " + serviceName + ", msg: update thought HealthController api"); pushService.serviceChanged(namespaceId, service.getName()); break; } } } else { throw new IllegalArgumentException("health check is still working, service: " + serviceName); } return "ok"; } ``` the `valid` will always be false, it is need to assign the value of `healthyString` to `valid` [https://github.com/alibaba/nacos/blob/master/naming/src/main/java/com/alibaba/nacos/naming/controllers/HealthController.java](https://github.com/alibaba/nacos/blob/master/naming/src/main/java/com/alibaba/nacos/naming/controllers/HealthController.java)

bug.title: The quick start shoud be updated ,Otherwise nacos 1.0 cannot be started by standalone mode
bug.body: ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* Desc: I want to run nacos1.0.0CA by standalone mode, Follow the quick start. but failed. Refer to [Quick start](https://nacos.io/zh-cn/docs/quick-start.html) should use `sh startup.sh -m standalone`, **in fact should update to 'bash startup.sh -m standalone' ** ### Describe what happened if we use `sh startup.sh -m standalone` , The nacos run with cluster mode ,and failed The error log as below: ``` root@instance-o70no2nw:/usr/local/cloud# cd nacos/bin root@instance-o70no2nw:/usr/local/cloud/nacos/bin# sh startup.sh -m standalone startup.sh: 78: startup.sh: [[: not found root@instance-o70no2nw:/usr/local/cloud/nacos/bin# cat /usr/local/cloud/nacos/logs/start.out Nacos 1.0.0 Running in cluster mode, All function modules java.io.FileNotFoundException: /usr/local/cloud/nacos/conf/cluster.conf (No such file or directory) 2019-06-04 22:31:57,267 ERROR read cluster conf fail ``` ### Describe what you expected to happen Check the startup.sh, we can find: ` if [[ "${MODE}" == "standalone" ]]; then .... ` **Cause: The sh command does not recognize the "[[]]" expression** ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. Use 'bash startup.sh -m standalone' 2. Update the quick start ### Tell us your environment Server: Ubuntu 18.04.2 LTS x64 JDK: jdk1.8.0_211 x64 Nacos: nacos-server-1.0.0 ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: Linux system deployment Nacos can not be started on a single machine
bug.body: ## Issue Description Linux system deployment Nacos can not be started to be single mode system:ubuntu18.04 nacos:nacos-server-1.0.0.tar.gz sh startup.sh -m standalone report:cluster.conf not found then: cannot get serverlist, so exit and Startup file report: startup.sh: 77: startup.sh: [[: not found startup.sh: 87: startup.sh: [[: not found startup.sh: 89: startup.sh: [[: not found startup.sh: 95: startup.sh: [[: not found

bug.title: Client access failed to get serverlist through endpoint
bug.body: 目前通过配置endpoint的方式来访问nacos server，访问的接口地址是/nacos/serverlist，这个接口在源码中没有，并且格式也不符合/v1/之类的规范。 因此想确认下，接口/nacos/serverlist是否没有具体的实现。

bug.title: It can't input text in Nacos Web Console with Firefox sometimes
bug.body: It can't input text in Nacos Web Console with Firefox sometimes 有时候在Nacos控制台页面上无法输入配置内容，我用的是Firefox浏览器，然后刷新一下页面又好了

bug.title: Nacos server1.0 client 1.0 occasionally null pointer exception when starting, there is no problem with debug mode
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description nacos server1.0 client 1.0 启动时偶发空指针异常，debug模式没有问题 nacos server 1.0.0 版本，client 是1.0.0版本，maven pom依赖： `<dependency> <groupId>com.alibaba.boot</groupId> <artifactId>dubbo-spring-boot-starter</artifactId> <version>0.2.1.RELEASE</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.alibaba</groupId> <artifactId>dubbo</artifactId> <version>2.6.5</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>io.netty</groupId> <artifactId>netty-all</artifactId> <version>4.1.31.Final</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.alibaba</groupId> <artifactId>dubbo-registry-nacos</artifactId> <version>0.0.2</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.alibaba.nacos</groupId> <artifactId>nacos-client</artifactId> <version>1.0.0</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.alibaba.boot</groupId> <artifactId>nacos-config-spring-boot-starter</artifactId> <version>0.2.1</version> <exclusions> <exclusion> <artifactId>spring-context-support</artifactId> <groupId>com.alibaba.spring</groupId> </exclusion> <exclusion> <artifactId>nacos-client</artifactId> <groupId>com.alibaba.nacos</groupId> </exclusion> <exclusion> <artifactId>spring-context</artifactId> <groupId>org.springframework</groupId> </exclusion> <exclusion> <artifactId>spring-core</artifactId> <groupId>org.springframework</groupId> </exclusion> <exclusion> <artifactId>slf4j-api</artifactId> <groupId>org.slf4j</groupId> </exclusion> </exclusions> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.alibaba.boot</groupId> <artifactId>nacos-config-spring-boot-actuator</artifactId> <version>0.2.1</version> </dependency>` springboot版本2.1.1.RELEASE Type: *bug report* or *feature request* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) 在dubbo服务启动的时候，在未知的情况下回出现空指针错误，此错误是偶发的，不是经常性出现，在run模式下启动dubbo服务，很久才能出现一次，在debug模式不会出现此问题 ### Describe what you expected to happen 错误信息下面传图片 ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. 2. 3. ### Tell us your environment ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: The official website example failed to run
bug.body: ## 步骤 - 本地按照官网教程搭建好nacos - 新建springcloud项目，pom文件来自[nacos-spring-cloud-example/](https://github.com/nacos-group/nacos-examples/blob/master/nacos-spring-cloud-example/nacos-spring-cloud-config-example/pom.xml) - 按照官网给的步骤依次配置[Nacos-config](https://github.com/spring-cloud-incubator/spring-cloud-alibaba/wiki/Nacos-config) # 结果 拿不到配置，但是如果按照纯Java方式却能获取到配置 `bootstrap.properties`: `spring.application.name=nacos-config` `spring.cloud.nacos.config.server-addr=127.0.0.1:8848` ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13191643/58543814-bfd69e80-8232-11e9-9937-e876befd1cb0.png) 日志 `2019-05-29 16:44:12.704 INFO 65456 --- [ main] b.c.PropertySourceBootstrapConfiguration : Located property source: CompositePropertySource {name='NACOS', propertySources=[NacosPropertySource {name='nacos-config.properties'}]}` 代码 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13191643/58544175-5b680f00-8233-11e9-8158-ca34e341524c.png) 结果 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13191643/58544055-252a8f80-8233-11e9-834c-9f7627b0fac4.png)

bug.title: If I have a service call that doesn't work, I shouldn't report an error in one second at a fixed time. I just need to report an error to tell you, so that the whole log can't be read by circular error reporting.
bug.body: ` 在HostReactor类里面这个方法 public synchronized ScheduledFuture<?> addTask(HostReactor.UpdateTask task) { return this.executor.schedule(task, 1000L, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS); }` 当发生服务调用不通的时候,你只需要告诉我那个服务挂掉了,提示一次或者几次,不需要1秒钟循环报错,这样如果我那个服务不能够及时启动,我这个服务的日志会出现大量错误信息,包括会有一个线程每隔1秒一直请求注册中心,

bug.title: When a service is deleted from the list of services, all services that are not associated with the deleted service will report an error.
bug.body: 首先我们设计的每个微服务,相当于一个小项目,我们项目之间不会互相调用更没有什么订阅关系 当我把其中一个服务删除掉之后,所有服务都会报错. 我想要的是那个服务假如我不想要了,我把他删除掉,但是我其他服务并没有订阅他啊,是因为nacos设置相同分组就代表相互订阅吗
