bug.title: Findbugs checked for some bugs
bug.body: ![Uploading image.png…]()

bug.title: Incubator-dubbo-spring-boot-project cannot distinguish services based on namespace
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* or *feature request* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) 在incubator-dubbo-spring-boot-project项目:https://github.com/apache/incubator-dubbo-spring-boot-project中，使用nacos为注册中心和配置中心，nacos可以根据namespace来做配置区分，但是无法根据namespace来做服务区分 ### Describe what you expected to happen ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. 2. 3. ### Tell us your environment ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: when registry center and config center separate，I found a bug
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## When the configuration center is separated from the registry, there are problems with the configuration center files. Type: *bug report* or *feature request* ### hello. In the development process, we separate the configuration center from the registry. When the configuration file is published carelessly in the registry, the configuration file we see in the configuration center is also up to date, because they share the same database. However, the configuration files actually used in the application were released in the configuration center for the last time. This problem has been bothering me for a long time. The solution is to redistribute the configuration file in the configuration center. I hope You can fix this bug. Thanks.

bug.title: @NacosPropertySource bug
bug.body: When using @NacosPropertySource to listen to data_id in springboot application, one attribute name in multiple data_ids cannot be the same, otherwise only one will be read (tested, using multiple groups still can't solve the problem, only use different attribute names, The problem can be solved)

bug.title: cannot deploy nacos server inside EDAS
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* cannot deploy nacos server inside EDAS. ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) when you deploy nacos server inside EDAS, namespace will be repaced with EDAS env -- ALIBABA_ALIWARE_NAMESPACE ### Describe what you expected to happen custom namespace should be primarily ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. deploy nacos server inside EDAS 2. startup app with nacos client ### Tell us your environment ### Anything else we need to know? found in nacos-client 0.9.1+

bug.title: Can't support ServiceName with uniqueId
bug.body: ## Currently, Naming Service can't support register multiple instance with same namespace and service name but different uniqueId Type: *bug report* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) Currently we have a service interface with multiple implementation, we want register the service instance with different uniqueId(like "group" in Dubbo or uniqueId in Alipay SOFARPC). but we found the naming service use namespace and service name to the key, which will replace the other Service with same service name but different group name. And here is the [code](https://github.com/alibaba/nacos/blob/master/naming/src/main/java/com/alibaba/nacos/naming/core/ServiceManager.java): In line: 418 ``` String key = KeyBuilder.buildInstanceListKey(namespaceId, serviceName, ephemeral); ``` ### Describe what you expected to happen naming service can support service name with different group name ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. register a service with service name "com.xxx.DemoService" and group name "test1" 2. register a service with service name "com.xxx.DemoService" and group name "test2" 3. goto console and found system has only a instance with group name "test2" ### Tell us your environment Nacos 1.0.0 JDK 1.8 Centos 7.0 ### Anything else we need to know?

Mysql Workbench or Intelij Datagrip connecting Mysql. ### Describe what you expected to happen Should be normal as Mysql 5.7.26 ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. Running MySQL 8.0.16 in docker container. ``` docker pull mysql docker run --name mysql88 -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=123456 -d mysql:latest ``` 2. Modify the application.properties, the database configuration as belowing: ``` spring.datasource.platform=mysql db.num=1 db.url.0=jdbc:mysql://192.168.11.81:3306/nacos_config?characterEncoding=utf8&connectTimeout=1000&socketTimeout=3000&autoReconnect=true ``` 3. Start nacos ` bash startup.sh` ### Tell us your environment MySQL 8.0.16 nacos 1.0.0 Ubuntu 18.04 ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: can not to bind aliyun ECS machine Intranet address
bug.body: my environment: CentOS 7.4 x86_64 nacos version is: nacos-server-0.9.0 I used Standalone mode and when I want to bind aliyun ECS Intranet address，italway bind 0.0.0.0,Although I restart the nacos server, it still bind 0.0.0.0。 the parameter i add to nacos config is: nacos.inetutils.ip-address=my_address:port Chinese： 我的环境是： CentOS 7.4 x86_64 nacos版本是:nacos-server-0.9.0 我在nacos配置文件中添加nacos.inetutils.ip-address=阿里云ECS内网地址：port 以后，重启nacos服务，他仍然监听0.0.0.0的地址，请问如何才能正确让他变成监听内网地址呢？是不是参数不对？如果不对，请问应该是加哪个参数才能解决？谢谢

bug.title: Healthy server list inconsistent in some situations
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description bug report ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) The Nacos cluster uses the healthy server list to keep the data in the cluster consistent. But in some circumstances the servers may have different healthy server list due to network error or high pressure of visits. ### Describe what you expected to happen Health server list keeps consistent between servers in Nacos cluster. ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) ### Tell us your environment ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: Nacos 1.0.0 release Clicking on the service list after the server starts is always a bug that automatically jumps to the login page.
bug.body: nacos 1.0.0 release 服务端启动后点击服务列表功能总是自动跳到登录页面的bug，登陆后点击服务列表功能点又会跳转至登录页面，希望排查下

bug.title: Client beat failed if beat info is too large
bug.body: Tomcat in Spring Boot has a default url length limit of 8KB, while beat info may contain metadatas that are larger than that. It's more appropriate to put the beat info into request body.

bug.title: Selector should not select the disable instance

Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) Dns-f will return no host found when all instances selected from Selector are disabled。 ### Describe what you expected to happen If all ip selected from Selector are disabled， the selector should return all instance ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) ### Tell us your environment Nacos 0.8 ### Anything else we need to know? I think it can be fixed by this way ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2010632/56106491-f5ba0f00-5f73-11e9-8626-d6140a0cd981.png)

bug.title: java.lang.IllegalStateException: unable to find local peer: 192.168.43.8:8848, all peers: [127.0.0.1:8849, 127.0.0.1:8850, 127.0.0.1:8848]
bug.body: nacos本地集群，mysql是一个ecs的单机版。 集群启动正常并且可以访问，但是服务注册不上。 控制台：java.lang.IllegalStateException: failed to req API:/nacos/v1/ns/instance after all servers([127.0.0.1:8848, 127.0.0.1:8849, 127.0.0.1:8850]) tried nacos.log：java.lang.IllegalStateException: unable to find local peer: 192.168.43.8:8848, all peers: [127.0.0.1:8849, 127.0.0.1:8850, 127.0.0.1:8848] 已尝试配置spring.zipkin.discoveryClientEnable=false，无效。 配置文件 spring.application.name=demo server.port=8001 spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.server-addr=127.0.0.1:8848,127.0.0.1:8849,127.0.0.1:8850 spring.zipkin.discoveryClientEnable=false 环境 nacos 1.0.0 ga springboot 2.1.4.RELEASE springcloud Greenwich.SR1 alibaba-dependencies 0.2.1.RELEASE

Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* or *feature request* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) In the code ”com.alibaba.nacos.naming.core.ServiceManager#createEmptyService“ When an service is created,the field[groupName] of Service is seted "DEFAULT_GROUP", Whether groupName should be obtained by the parameter serviceName? because serviceName is NamingUtils.getGroupedName(serviceName, groupName) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12210796/55862683-84f9a800-5bab-11e9-85ef-d1bf9ad95e15.png) ### Describe what you expected to happen ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. 2. 3. ### Tell us your environment nacos version:1.0.0-RC3 ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: nacos dubbo double consumer regist error
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description 一个common dubbo service中心 一个consumer admin中心 一个consumer app中心 两个消费者引用同一个 dubbo service 同一台机器上注册nacos失败 `Failed to retry register [consumer://10.0.75.1/com.xc.service.TestService?application=dubbo-xc-app&category=consumers&check=false&dubbo=2.0.2&interface=com.xc.service.TestService&methods=test&pid=40448&qos.enable=false&side=consumer&timestamp=1554804730862, consumer://10.0.75.1/com.xc.service.TestCacosService?application=dubbo-xc-app&category=consumers&check=false&dubbo=2.0.2&interface=com.xc.service.TestCacosService&methods=send&pid=40448&qos.enable=false&side=consumer&timestamp=1554804731423], waiting for again, cause: failed to req API:/nacos/v1/ns/instance after all servers([127.0.0.1:8848]) tried: failed to req API:http://127.0.0.1:8848/nacos/v1/ns/instance. code:500 msg: ErrCode:400,ErrMsg:instance already exist: 10.0.75.1:unknown:DEFAULT_1.0_true_false_DEFAULT, dubbo version: 2.6.6, current host: 10.0.75.1 ` Type: *bug report* or *feature request* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) ### Describe what you expected to happen ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. com.alibaba dubbo 2.6.6 2. com.alibaba.nacos nacos-client 1.0.0-RC2 3. ### Tell us your environment windows 10 ### Anything else we need to know?

bug.title: Nacos use a database presence configuration, and the console service list page cannot query the data

bug.title: Nacos Service lists cannot display services registered in other namespaces
bug.body: ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) I used the Nacos namespace function and found that the function worked, but the Nacos console could not display the corresponding services in the corresponding namespace in the service list. ### Describe what you expected to happen Display the corresponding service in the corresponding namespace in the service list ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. create a new namespace in nacos 2. used params ` -Dspring.cloud.nacos.config.namespace=yournamespace` 3. look nacos console services list 4. You will find that they are all registered in public ### Tell us your environment nacos 1.0.0-RC2 spring cloud Greenwich.SR1 spring boot 2.1.3.RELEASE ### Anything else we need to know? Solve it as soon as possible, thanks!

bug.title: Client beat processor task lost
bug.body: ClientBeatProcessor is a global object but its rsInfo may be updated to that in the next beat when the processor is running, so the former rfInfo as well as the former beat is lost.

bug.title: The default cluster information has changed so that the service cannot be deleted
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* or *feature request* The default cluster name is changed when I use configuration management and service discovery,which causes the heartbeat to be lost, even if the service is normal。 ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) 1、ERROR [IP-DEAD] failed to delete ip automatically 2、default clusterName is “DEFAULT” 3、changed clusterName is {"defaultCheckPort":80,"defaultPort":80,"healthChecker":{"type":"TCP"},"metadata":{},"name":"DEFAULT","useIPPort4Check":true} ### Describe what you expected to happen ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. 2. 3. ### Tell us your environment 1、nacos 0.9.0 standalone 2、springboot 2.0.6 4、springcloud Finchley.SR2 3、spring-cloud-alibaba-dependencies 0.2.1 ### Anything else we need to know? When I use these two components, the cluster name becomes a json string unless I manually call the interface add service to guarantee that the cluster name is defalt

bug.title: nacos-console-1.0.0-RC1 failed to start in idea
bug.body: ## Issue Description Local nacos0.8.0 upgrade to nacos-1.0.0.RC1 (using 1.0.0.RC1 branch source) failed to start nacos-console in idea,but it works normally through the official jar form. java.lang.IllegalStateException: StandardEngine[Tomcat].StandardHost[localhost].TomcatEmbeddedContext[/nacos] failed to start at org.springframework.boot.web.embedded.tomcat.TomcatWebServer.rethrowDeferredStartupExceptions(TomcatWebServer.java:171) at org.springframework.boot.web.embedded.tomcat.TomcatWebServer.initialize(TomcatWebServer.java:109) ... 13 common frames omitted ``` ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. Download the source code on the 1.0.0-RC1 branch 2. Import idea, download maven dependencies 3. Add a persistent configuration to application.properties under the nacos-console project ```ymal spring.datasource.platform=mysql db.num=1 db.url.0=jdbc:mysql://localhost:3333/nacos_dev?characterEncoding=utf8&connectTimeout=1000&socketTimeout=3000&autoReconnect=true&useSSL=false&serverTimezone=UTC db.user=root db.password=123456 ``` 4. Start the nacos-console project without parameters ### Tell us your environment OS:windows10 mysql:8.0

bug.title: After upgrading to 1.0, Tip when registering for service: java.lang.IllegalStateException: failed to req API:/nacos/v1/ns/instance after all servers ([127.0.0.1) tried: failed to req API: 8848]) tried: failed to req API: http://127.0.0.1:8848/nacos/v1/ns/instance. Code:500 msg: ErrCode:400,ErrMsg:service not found, namespace: public, service: DEFAULT_GROUP@@gateway-server
bug.body: After upgrading to 1.0, Tip when registering for service: java.lang.IllegalStateException: failed to req API:/nacos/v1/ns/instance after all servers ([127.0.0.1) tried: failed to req API: 8848]) tried: failed to req API: http://127.0.0.1:8848/nacos/v1/ns/instance. Code:500 msg: ErrCode:400,ErrMsg:service not found, namespace: public, service: DEFAULT_GROUP@@gateway-server. After communicating with Zhang long, it is found that the default mode of NACOS1.0 is mixed, which requires adding services manually before registering an instance, so it is hoped that the caller can be informed of the cause of failure, such as the current mode, when prompted for errors.

bug.title: 0.9.0 cluster mode,There is a high probability that configuration cannot be updated to Java application.
bug.body: env: nacos 0.9.0 , windows server 2016, jdk11, spring cloud Finchley.SR2, spring cloud alibaba 0.2.1.RELEASE, spring-boot-starter-parent 2.0.7.RELEASE, mysql 5.7. During the update process, the database was successfully updated. when config website update the config content. if standalone mode, it's ok. if cluster mode only 1 node, it's ok. if cluster mode 2,3 or 4 nodes, There is a high probability that configuration content cannot be updated to Java application. then restart the nacos server,java application will get the newest configuration content.

bug.body: ubuntu18.04.1 No modifications have been made to the configuration file /# sh /opt/nacos/bin/startup.sh -m standalone /opt/nacos/bin/startup.sh: 49: /opt/nacos/bin/startup.sh: [[: not found /opt/nacos/bin/startup.sh: 60: /opt/nacos/bin/startup.sh: [[: not found /usr/lib/jvm/java-8-oracle/bin/java -server -Xms2g -Xmx2g -Xmn1g -XX:MetaspaceSize=128m -XX:MaxMetaspaceSize=320m -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError -XX:HeapDumpPath=/opt/nacos/logs/java_heapdump.hprof -XX:-UseLargePages -Djava.ext.dirs=/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-oracle/jre/lib/ext:/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-oracle/lib/ext:/opt/nacos/plugins/cmdb -Xloggc:/opt/nacos/logs/nacos_gc.log -verbose:gc -XX:+PrintGCDetails -XX:+PrintGCDateStamps -XX:+PrintGCTimeStamps -XX:+UseGCLogFileRotation -XX:NumberOfGCLogFiles=10 -XX:GCLogFileSize=100M -Dnacos.home=/opt/nacos -jar /opt/nacos/target/nacos-server.jar --spring.config.location=classpath:/,classpath:/config/,file:./,file:./config/,file:/opt/nacos/conf/ --logging.config=/opt/nacos/conf/nacos-logback.xml /opt/nacos/bin/startup.sh: 80: /opt/nacos/bin/startup.sh: [[: not found nacos is starting，you can check the /opt/nacos/logs/start.out # java -version java version "1.8.0_191" Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.8.0_191-b12) Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 25.191-b12, mixed mode)

bug.title: The introduction of the Nacos Client 0.9.0 version dependency makes the "log4j.configurationFile" property of Log4j2 not valid.
bug.body: ```Java System.setProperty("log4j.configurationFile", "xxx"); ``` Log ``` WARN No Root logger was configured, creating default ERROR-level Root logger with Console appender ```

bug.title: BeatInfo scheduled property may have the memory visibility issue
bug.body: The property `scheduled` of `com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.beat.BeatInfo` can be read and written by multi threads in `BeatReactor`, but without `sychronized` or `volatile` protection. This may cause some unpredictable heart beat behaviors. So I think the property `scheduled` should add `volatile`.

bug.title: Nacos+MySQL8 startup error
bug.body: <!-- Here is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! If you're looking for help, please check our mail list、WeChat group and the Gitter room. Please try to use English to describe your issue, or at least provide a snippet of English translation. 我们鼓励使用英文，如果不能直接使用，可以使用翻译软件，您仍旧可以保留中文原文。 --> ## Issue Description Type: *bug report* or *feature request* ### Describe what happened (or what feature you want) Nacos0.8 connection MySQL8.0.15 error ### Describe what you expected to happen Nacos supports MySQL8.0+ ### How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible) 1. Support for modifying jdbc connection driver ### Tell us your environment nacos 0.8.0 MySQL 8.0.15 jdk 1.8 ### Anything else we need to know? The database is determined to be working properly, and the project can also be connected.

bug.title: Nacos configures NacosConfigurationProperties on a class and cannot get a configuration other than DEFALUT_GROUP
bug.body: nacos 在类上配置 @NacosConfigurationProperties(dataId = "gateway-local.properties", groupId = "GATEWAY_GROUP", autoRefreshed = true) 获取不到该组的配置 求解释 不配置可以获取到DEFALUT_GROUP的

bug.title: failed to req API:/nacos/v1/ns/api/srvIPXT after all servers
bug.body: # Reporting bugs If any part of the Nacos project has bugs or documentation mistakes, please let us know by [opening an issue](https://github.com/alibaba/nacos/issues/new). We treat bugs and mistakes very seriously and believe no issue is too small, anyOne is implement. Before creating a bug report, please check that an issue reporting the same problem does not already exist. To make the bug report accurate and easy to understand, please try to create bug reports that are: - Specific. Include as much details as possible: which version, what environment, what configuration, etc. If the bug is related to running the Nacos server, please attach the Nacos log (the starting log with Nacos configuration is especially important). - Reproducible. Include the steps to reproduce the problem. We understand some issues might be hard to reproduce, please includes the steps that might lead to the problem. If possible, please attach the affected Nacos data dir and stack strace to the bug report. - Unique. Do not duplicate existing bug report. It may be worthwhile to read [Elika Etemad’s article on filing good bug reports](http://fantasai.inkedblade.net/style/talks/filing-good-bugs/) before creating a bug report. We might ask for further information to locate a bug. A duplicated bug report will be closed. # 报告错误 如果Nacos项目的任何部分存在问题或文档问题，请通过[opening an issue](https://github.com/alibaba/nacos/issues/new)告诉我们。我们非常认真地对待错误和错误，在产品面前没有不重要的问题。不过在创建错误报告之前，请检查是否存在报告相同问题的issues。 为了使错误报告准确且易于理解，请尝试创建以下错误报告： - 具体到细节。包括尽可能多的细节：哪个版本，什么环境，什么配置等。如果错误与运行Nacos服务器有关，请附加Nacos日志（具有Nacos配置的起始日志尤为重要）。 - 可复现。包括重现问题的步骤。我们理解某些问题可能难以重现，请包括可能导致问题的步骤。如果可能，请将受影响的Nacos数据目录和堆栈strace附加到错误报告中。 - 不重复。不要复制现有的错误报告。 在创建错误报告之前，最好阅读下[Elika Etemad关于提交好错误报告的文章](http://fantasai.inkedblade.net/style/talks/filing-good-bugs/)，相信 会给你启发。 我们可能会要求您提供更多信息以查找错误。将关闭重复的错误报告。 [nacos-issue](https://github.com/alibaba/nacos/issues/new) [filing-good-bugs](http://fantasai.inkedblade.net/style/talks/filing-good-bugs/)

bug.title: Instance information can be obtained through nacos/v1/ns/instances, namingService#getAllInstance cannot get
bug.body: 通过访问，http://127.0.0.1:8848/nacos/v1/ns/instances?serviceName=demo可以获取到serviceName = `demo`的服务信息，如下： ``` { "metadata": {}, "dom": "demo", "cacheMillis": 10000, "useSpecifiedURL": false, "hosts": [ { "valid": true, "marked": false, "metadata": null, "instanceId": "192.168.1.54#8080#DEFAULT#demo", "port": 8080, "ip": "192.168.1.54", "clusterName": "DEFAULT", "weight": 0, "serviceName": "demo", "enabled": true } ], "checksum": "410080699ad446f90ee2c978766601821551259718526", "lastRefTime": 1551259718526, "env": "", "clusters": "" } ``` 通过NamingService#getAllInstances方法相同的serviceName却无法获取到内容： ``` [] ```

bug.title: JSON格式配置不正确
bug.body: 现象: 在控制台编辑配置，配置格式为JSON,配置内容为标准的json格式 [ { "jdbc":"a", "url":"cc" } ], 项目启动报错: Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Could not resolve placeholder 'jdbc' in string value "${jdbc}" at org.springframework.util.PropertyPlaceholderHelper.parseStringValue(PropertyPlaceholderHelper.java:173) at org.springframework.util.PropertyPlaceholderHelper.replacePlaceholders(PropertyPlaceholderHelper.java:125) at org.springframework.core.env.AbstractPropertyResolver.doResolvePlaceholders(AbstractPropertyResolver.java:190) at org.springframework.core.env.AbstractPropertyResolver.resolveRequiredPlaceholders(AbstractPropertyResolver.java:164) at org.springframework.context.support.PropertySourcesPlaceholderConfigurer$2.resolveStringValue(PropertySourcesPlaceholderConfigurer.java:167) at org.springframework.beans.factory.support.AbstractBeanFactory.resolveEmbeddedValue(AbstractBeanFactory.java:764) 如果改成非标准json格式，编辑器提醒格式异常，项目却可以正常启动并且读取数据 [ { jdbc:a, url:cc } ] 原因: 项目读取配置是用NacosUtils#toProperties()方法，最终是使用java.util.Properties#load()方法，这个方法加载标准json格式后，key都是带双引号的，导致spring无法识别配置，去掉配置的双引号就可以了，但是编辑器却提醒格式异常。

bug.title: The interval at which the heartbeat is sent in BeatReactor is not controlled by the server return value.
bug.body: 最近在看Nacos源码，截止目前的master分支，在`com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.beat.BeatReactor`类的实现中，默认启动时会以5秒一次的频率发送心跳，`BeatProcessor`会对`dom2Beat`中的每个值创建`BeatTask`发送心跳，在`BeatTask`中会接收服务端返回的`clientBeatInterval`字段并设置给`BeatReactor`类中的`clientBeatInterval`。关键代码如下： ``` class BeatProcessor implements Runnable { @Override public void run() { try { for (Map.Entry<String, BeatInfo> entry : dom2Beat.entrySet()) { BeatInfo beatInfo = entry.getValue(); if (beatInfo.isScheduled()) { continue; } beatInfo.setScheduled(true); executorService.schedule(new BeatTask(beatInfo), 0, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS); } } catch (Exception e) { LogUtils.LOG.error("CLIENT-BEAT", "Exception while scheduling beat.", e); } } } class BeatTask implements Runnable { BeatInfo beatInfo; public BeatTask(BeatInfo beatInfo) { this.beatInfo = beatInfo; } @Override public void run() { long result = serverProxy.sendBeat(beatInfo); beatInfo.setScheduled(false); if (result > 0) { clientBeatInterval = result; } } } ``` 我理解设计目的是根据服务端返回的心跳间隔来调整客户端发送心跳的频率，但在`BeatReactor`的构造函数中，`BeatProcessor`是用以下代码启动的： ``` executorService.scheduleAtFixedRate(new BeatProcessor(), 0, clientBeatInterval, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS); ``` 所以导致的结果是，不管服务端返回的`clientBeatInterval`值是多少，客户端都只会以5秒的间隔发送心跳，返回值对心跳任务没有任何影响。是bug还是我理解有问题？

bug.title: Service cannot be registered
bug.body: When the Springboot version is 2.1.2 (currently tested only for this, and possibly the same for other adjacent versions), Nacos will not be detected, resulting in the inability to register services. Versions 2.0.4 and 2.0.6 passed the test. I don't know if it's a bug in spring boot itself.

bug.body: # Reporting bugs If any part of the Nacos project has bugs or documentation mistakes, please let us know by [opening an issue](https://github.com/alibaba/nacos/issues/new). We treat bugs and mistakes very seriously and believe no issue is too small, anyOne is implement. Before creating a bug report, please check that an issue reporting the same problem does not already exist. To make the bug report accurate and easy to understand, please try to create bug reports that are: - Specific. Include as much details as possible: which version, what environment, what configuration, etc. If the bug is related to running the Nacos server, please attach the Nacos log (the starting log with Nacos configuration is especially important). - Reproducible. Include the steps to reproduce the problem. We understand some issues might be hard to reproduce, please includes the steps that might lead to the problem. If possible, please attach the affected Nacos data dir and stack strace to the bug report. - Unique. Do not duplicate existing bug report. It may be worthwhile to read [Elika Etemad’s article on filing good bug reports](http://fantasai.inkedblade.net/style/talks/filing-good-bugs/) before creating a bug report. We might ask for further information to locate a bug. A duplicated bug report will be closed. # 报告错误 如果Nacos项目的任何部分存在问题或文档问题，请通过[opening an issue](https://github.com/alibaba/nacos/issues/new)告诉我们。我们非常认真地对待错误和错误，在产品面前没有不重要的问题。不过在创建错误报告之前，请检查是否存在报告相同问题的issues。 为了使错误报告准确且易于理解，请尝试创建以下错误报告： - 具体到细节。包括尽可能多的细节：哪个版本，什么环境，什么配置等。如果错误与运行Nacos服务器有关，请附加Nacos日志（具有Nacos配置的起始日志尤为重要）。 - 可复现。包括重现问题的步骤。我们理解某些问题可能难以重现，请包括可能导致问题的步骤。如果可能，请将受影响的Nacos数据目录和堆栈strace附加到错误报告中。 - 不重复。不要复制现有的错误报告。 在创建错误报告之前，最好阅读下[Elika Etemad关于提交好错误报告的文章](http://fantasai.inkedblade.net/style/talks/filing-good-bugs/)，相信 会给你启发。 我们可能会要求您提供更多信息以查找错误。将关闭重复的错误报告。 [nacos-issue](https://github.com/alibaba/nacos/issues/new) [filing-good-bugs](http://fantasai.inkedblade.net/style/talks/filing-good-bugs/)

Include the steps to reproduce the problem. We understand some issues might be hard to reproduce, please includes the steps that might lead to the problem. If possible, please attach the affected Nacos data dir and stack strace to the bug report. - Unique. Do not duplicate existing bug report. It may be worthwhile to read [Elika Etemad’s article on filing good bug reports](http://fantasai.inkedblade.net/style/talks/filing-good-bugs/) before creating a bug report. We might ask for further information to locate a bug. A duplicated bug report will be closed. # 报告错误 如果Nacos项目的任何部分存在问题或文档问题，请通过[opening an issue](https://github.com/alibaba/nacos/issues/new)告诉我们。我们非常认真地对待错误和错误，在产品面前没有不重要的问题。不过在创建错误报告之前，请检查是否存在报告相同问题的issues。 为了使错误报告准确且易于理解，请尝试创建以下错误报告： - 具体到细节。包括尽可能多的细节：哪个版本，什么环境，什么配置等。如果错误与运行Nacos服务器有关，请附加Nacos日志（具有Nacos配置的起始日志尤为重要）。 - 可复现。包括重现问题的步骤。我们理解某些问题可能难以重现，请包括可能导致问题的步骤。如果可能，请将受影响的Nacos数据目录和堆栈strace附加到错误报告中。 - 不重复。不要复制现有的错误报告。 在创建错误报告之前，最好阅读下[Elika Etemad关于提交好错误报告的文章](http://fantasai.inkedblade.net/style/talks/filing-good-bugs/)，相信 会给你启发。 我们可能会要求您提供更多信息以查找错误。将关闭重复的错误报告。 [nacos-issue](https://github.com/alibaba/nacos/issues/new) [filing-good-bugs](http://fantasai.inkedblade.net/style/talks/filing-good-bugs/)

bug.title: Nacos console Bug
bug.body: # Reporting bugs ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31835543/51317461-980c4880-1a92-11e9-90e7-ae665302a790.png) not support Enter key to Jump pages, need click "View" button. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31835543/51317500-b3775380-1a92-11e9-8bea-9a2abda9fc4d.png) If any part of the Nacos project has bugs or documentation mistakes, please let us know by [opening an issue](https://github.com/alibaba/nacos/issues/new). We treat bugs and mistakes very seriously and believe no issue is too small, anyOne is implement. Before creating a bug report, please check that an issue reporting the same problem does not already exist. To make the bug report accurate and easy to understand, please try to create bug reports that are: - Specific. Include as much details as possible: which version, what environment, what configuration, etc. If the bug is related to running the Nacos server, please attach the Nacos log (the starting log with Nacos configuration is especially important). - Reproducible. Include the steps to reproduce the problem. We understand some issues might be hard to reproduce, please includes the steps that might lead to the problem. If possible, please attach the affected Nacos data dir and stack strace to the bug report. - Unique. Do not duplicate existing bug report. It may be worthwhile to read [Elika Etemad’s article on filing good bug reports](http://fantasai.inkedblade.net/style/talks/filing-good-bugs/) before creating a bug report. We might ask for further information to locate a bug. A duplicated bug report will be closed. # 报告错误 如果Nacos项目的任何部分存在问题或文档问题，请通过[opening an issue](https://github.com/alibaba/nacos/issues/new)告诉我们。我们非常认真地对待错误和错误，在产品面前没有不重要的问题。不过在创建错误报告之前，请检查是否存在报告相同问题的issues。 为了使错误报告准确且易于理解，请尝试创建以下错误报告： - 具体到细节。包括尽可能多的细节：哪个版本，什么环境，什么配置等。如果错误与运行Nacos服务器有关，请附加Nacos日志（具有Nacos配置的起始日志尤为重要）。 - 可复现。包括重现问题的步骤。我们理解某些问题可能难以重现，请包括可能导致问题的步骤。如果可能，请将受影响的Nacos数据目录和堆栈strace附加到错误报告中。 - 不重复。不要复制现有的错误报告。 在创建错误报告之前，最好阅读下[Elika Etemad关于提交好错误报告的文章](http://fantasai.inkedblade.net/style/talks/filing-good-bugs/)，相信 会给你启发。 我们可能会要求您提供更多信息以查找错误。将关闭重复的错误报告。 [nacos-issue](https://github.com/alibaba/nacos/issues/new) [filing-good-bugs](http://fantasai.inkedblade.net/style/talks/filing-good-bugs/)

bug.title: Nacos documentation error
bug.body: On the Nacos official website [SpringBoot start page] (https://nacos.io/zh-cn/docs/quick-start-spring-boot.html) page, set the property value sample code is wrong, // 在Nacos官网 [SpringBoot开始页](https://nacos.io/zh-cn/docs/quick-start-spring-boot.html) 页面，设置属性值示例代码有误， `@NacosValue("${useLocalCache:false}", autoRefreshed = true)` Should be // 应该为 `@NacosValue(value = "${useLocalCache:false}", autoRefreshed = true)` I hope I can modify it. // 希望能修改一下 *** WE STRONGLY SUGGEST YOU TO DESCRIBE YOUR ISSUE IN ENGLISH ***

bug.title: Nacos use MySQL8 driver is not support MySQL8
bug.body: Purpose: Start a cluster of nacos 0.7 // 目的：启动nacos 0.7的集群 Accident: Startup error, error: DumpService was not created successfully // 意外：启动出错，报错：DumpService没有创建成功 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22925560/51024121-9ee31900-15c3-11e9-9c9e-745399f86f64.png) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22925560/51024133-a60a2700-15c3-11e9-8d8b-32b494120230.png) Check the configuration file without errors // 检查配置文件并没有错误 ============================👇=================================== Replace the mysql database version, the result is successful! ! ! // 更换mysql数据库版本，结果成功！！！ Cause **The mysql driver used by nacos does not support mysql8. ** // 原因 **nacos使用的mysql驱动不支持mysql8。** Can support mysql8. // 可以对mysql8进行支持。 *** WE STRONGLY SUGGEST YOU TO DESCRIBE YOUR ISSUE IN ENGLISH ***

bug.title: Always print a NPE log at start

bug.title: Demo Error Information on NacosDiscovery Official Website
bug.body: Official website demo address: // 官网demo地址： https://github.com/spring-cloud-incubator/spring-cloud-alibaba/wiki/Nacos-discovery 1. There is less information about configuration items. // 1、配置项信息中少了关于 spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.cluster-name This note. // 这个的说明。 There are 14 configuration items under discovery. Only 13 configuration explanations are given on the official website. // discovery下一共有14个配置项。官网上只给出了13个配置项解释 2. Annotation errors // 2、注释错误 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20394370/50760046-a5128600-12a1-11e9-8df3-4e03343c76f5.png) 3、Provider -> application.properties 中name为【nacos-producer】 Under Consumer, the acquisition becomes a nacos-provider, resulting in instances not being available. NullPointException. // 到了Consumer下面获取就变成了【nacos-provider】，导致instance获取不到. NullPointException。 ***!!!!WE STRONGLY ENCOURAGE YOU TO DESCRIBE YOUR ISSUE IN ENGLISH!!!!***

bug.title: Errors in Nacos Cluster Deployment
bug.body: I used three machines to do cluster deployment tests. The address is as follows: // 我使用了三台机器做集群部署测试,地址如下： 192.168.0.72，192.168.0.73，192.168.0.74 The cluster.conf and application.properties configuration of Nacos running on three machines are the same, as follows: // 三台机器运行的Nacos的cluster.conf和application.properties配置相同，如下： ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46366155/50675686-91a9b580-102a-11e9-8f87-cb94fed404ba.png) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46366155/50675697-a4bc8580-102a-11e9-80ca-a16d9a4a546a.png) 执行启动脚本后，三台机器都打印了： Nacos started successfully in cluster mode. But then I found the following mistakes: // 但在后续我发现了下面的错误： The following exceptions are printed in the logs/naming-server.log of the three machines: // 三台机器的logs/naming-server.log中都打印了下面的异常： ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46366155/50675815-6378a580-102b-11e9-9461-a5367556b111.png) At the same time, I found that nacos. log printed the following error on 73. This exception was not found on 72,74: // 同时在73上我发现了nacos.log打印了如下错误，此异常在72，74上没有发现： ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46366155/50675860-c8cc9680-102b-11e9-838b-3f0cf5794864.png) We look forward to your reply! // 期待您的回复！ ***!!!!WE STRONGLY ENCOURAGE YOU TO DESCRIBE YOUR ISSUE IN ENGLISH!!!!***

bug.title: Nacos 0.6.1 console cannot find service windows
bug.body: ``` @SpringBootApplication @EnableDiscoveryClient ``` ``` server: port: 8203 spring: application: name: alinacosConsumerService boot: admin: client: url: http://192.168.200.135:7000 main: allow-bean-definition-overriding: true jackson: default-property-inclusion: non_null time-zone: GMT+8 date-format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss cloud: nacos: discovery: server-addr: 192.168.10.112:8848 # Nacos registry; // #nacos注册中心; logging: config: classpath:logback-boot.xml management: endpoints: web: exposure: include: "*" endpoint: env: enabled: true Queue name for sending mail; // #发送邮件的队列名称; blockchain: queue: blockchain_queue ``` The Nacos console could not find the service after booting. // 启动后nacos控制台发现不了这个服务。 name-service.log ``` 2018-12-30 00:15:30,303 INFO [VIPSRV-DISTRO] healthy server list changed, disable health check for 60000ms from now on, healthList: [],newHealthyList [192.168.10.112:0] 2018-12-30 00:15:35,052 INFO [SERVER-INIT] got port:8848 2018-12-30 00:15:35,052 INFO [SERVER-INIT] got path:/nacos 2018-12-30 00:15:35,516 INFO [AUTO-INIT] leader is: 192.168.10.112:8848 2018-12-30 00:16:00,544 INFO [HEALTH-CHECK] health check is false 2018-12-30 00:16:30,512 INFO [VIPSRV-DISTRO] distro threshold restored and stable now, enable health check. current ratio: 1.0 2018-12-30 00:16:30,512 INFO [VIPSRV-DISTRO] healthy server list changed, disable health check for 60000ms from now on ``` /nacos/v1/ns/api/hello ``` "msg": "Hello! I am Nacos-Naming and healthy! total dom: diamond 0,raft 0, local port:8848" ``` Do you need to configure other parameters? // 还需要配置其他的参数吗？ ***!!!!WE STRONGLY ENCOURAGE YOU TO DESCRIBE YOUR ISSUE IN ENGLISH!!!!***

bug.title: There's an error and some obscure descriptions
bug.body: * As the pic below, there miss a ```^``` ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1664952/47280728-5cd0b980-d60a-11e8-9476-a810aa8bb7e4.png) * it will be better to document the post body type. json form and so on? * the listen port is not the same. 8848 8080 ? * the example can be more Runnable. replace some like below ``` http://serverIp:8080/nacos/v1/cs/configs/listener POST request body data: Listening-Configs=dataId^2group^2contentMD5^2tenant^1 ``` with ``` curl -x POST xxxxxxxx ```
